loans.name: Twitange Group

texts.en:
Scolastica D., who is in her early forties, is married with five children who are still at school. She has been a fish monger for five years. She buys her fish from the ocean area of Kigamboni, fries them and then takes them to her home area of Mbenzi for selling. She works from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Scolastica's 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy more fish and repaid it successfully. She hopes for a loan to increase her fish stock. Her dream is to one day buy land.

Scolastica will share this loan with her loan group "Twitange" which has a total of 18 members, who will hold each other accountable in repaying their loans. In the picture, Scolastica is 3rd from the right in the front row wearing an orange sarong.(It was raining that day so the photo was not good and Fadhili K. was trying to adjust his glasses so his face was a bit covered).

loans.use: To increase her fish stock.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: El sr. José  vive en el barrio Bolivia de la localidad de el torno hace mucho tiempo su actividad es el transporte  con el recorrido Santa Cruz el torno, su esposa la señora Yessenia  y  tienen tres niños en etapa escolar, persona responsable, tiene su casa propia, pero le falta terminar un ambiente y con el dinero del crédito comprara material de construcción como cemento, pintura, etc. Para la culminación de su vivienda, el señor esta agradecido con nuestra entidad por haber confiado en el y brindarle un apoyo para poder culminar su vivienda.
texts.en: José lives in the neighborhood of Bolivia in the town of El Torno. For a long time, he has been working in the transportation business on the Santa Cruz-El Torno route. He is married to Yessenia and they have three small children of school age. He is a responsible person who has his own house, but he needs to finish a room. He will use the loan to buy construction material such as cement, paint, etc. His is grateful to our organization for having confidence in him and offering him the support he needs to finish his house.

loans.use: to finish building his home.

loans.name: Lupe

texts.es: La señora Lupe tiene unas habitaciones las cuales las alquila y genera ingresos; su esposo es empleado público. El crédito lo requiere para comprar: material de construcción ya que construirá una nueva habitación en obra fina. Vive en casa propia  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Sopocahi en la ciudad de La Paz;  es casada y tiene cinco hijos. Es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2006, con un excelente historial de pagos.
texts.en: Lupe has some rooms that she rents out for a profit. Her husband is a public employee. She needs the loan to buy: construction materials as she will be building a new room to a high standard. She lives in her own house which is in the Sopocachi area of the city of La Paz. She is married and has 5 children. She has been a client of IMPRO since 2006, and she has an excellent repayment history.

loans.use: To buy construction materials for a new room in her home.

loans.name: Elar Vidali

texts.es:
Elar tiene 46 años de edad, es casado y reside en el distrito de Pucalá, ubicado a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Elar vive junto a su esposa y tres de sus hijos varones que se encuentran en edad escolar. 

La zona  de Pucalá se caracteriza por ser  una zona rural y dedicarse al cultivo de caña de azúcar debido a que existe una fábrica azucarera en la zona.

Desde hace quince años, Elar, se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, de los cuales extrae su leche para su venderla  a los  acopiadores de la zona (acopiadores son las personas que recolectan la leche para venderla a empresas grandes) y en algunos casos cría y engorda su ganado para vender la carne de este. Esta actividad le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia.

Elar también tiene otros empleos ocasionales como la albañilería.

Elar solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra de alimento balanceado para su ganado, que le permitirá tener una mejor calidad de leche que podrá vender a mayor precio.

Elar desea ahorrar sus ingresos para cumplir su sueño de tener su propio establo.
texts.en:
Elar is 46 years old, married, and lives in Pucalá district which is 45 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  Elar lives together with his wife and three of his sons who are school age.

Pucalá district is noted as being a rural area where sugarcane is grown.  There is a sugarcane factory in the area.

For 15 years, Elar has been raising cattle.  He milks his cows and then sells the milk to 'acopiadores' in the area ('acopiadores' are the people who collect the milk to sell on to big companies) and, in some cases, he raises and fattens his cattle to sell as meat.  This business has allowed him to get his family ahead in life.

Elar also carries out other temporary jobs such as construction work.

Elar is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which he will use to buy balanced feed for his cattle.  This will enable him to obtain a better quality of milk which he will be able to sell for at a higher price.

Elar would like to save his profits so that he can fulfil his dream of owning his own stable.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his cattle

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga es un cliente de 34 años de edad, vive en casa de padres ubicada en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz –  Chiclayo. Ésta es una comunidad urbana en vías de crecimiento gracias a las gestiones gubernamentales.

Olga goza de buenas referencias personales y laborales manifestadas por vecinos y amigos, que la catalogan como una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora.

Olga se dedica a brindar un servicio de transporte público. Ella cuenta con una mototaxi (moto con una cabina en la parte trasera  donde se pueden transportar pasajeros) la cual alquila desde la puerta de su casa a clientes conocidos. Además de ello, Olga obtiene ingresos adicionales por ejercer las funciones de cosmetóloga en un local ubicado en el mercado más conocido de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Dichas actividades las viene realizando hace más de 3 años.

Olga solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para el mantenimiento de su unidad vehicular, para reparar rodajes y cabina de ésta.

Olga espera tener una flota de 5 motos para así incrementar sus ingresos y por consiguiente mejorar su calidad de vida. Es un cliente recurrente de Edpyme Alternativa y cuenta con buenas referencias crediticias.
texts.en:
Olga is 34 years old.  She lives in her parents' home which is located in José Leonardo Ortiz-Chiclayo district.  This is an urban community which is developing thanks to the government's work. 

Olga has good personal and work references from neighbors and friends who describe her as a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman.

Olga provides a public transport service.  She owns a motorcycle taxi (a motorcycle with a cabin in back for transporting passengers) which she hires out from her front door to known customers.  She also makes additional income by working as a cosmetologist in premises which are located in the best-known market in the city of Chiclayo.  She has been engaged in these business activities for more than three years.

Olga is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can have some maintenance work done on her vehicle.  She would like to repair the wheels and the cabin.

Olga hopes to eventually own a fleet of five motorcycles so that she can increase her income and thereby improve her quality of life.  She is a repeat client of Edpyme Alternativa and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to repair the wheels and the cabin of her motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Marythza

texts.es: La señora Marythza se dedica a la venta de perfumes y distintas variedades de maquilles y también trabaja como  impulsadota en un empresa de lácteos. El crédito lo requiere para comprar: cremas y perfumes de varón para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Vive en alquiler la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Santa Rosa de la ciudad de El Alto;  es soltera y no tiene hijos. Es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2008.
texts.en: Marthyza works selling perfumes and various brands of make up and she also works as a product promotor for a dairy. She needs the loan to buy: creams and colognes for men to meet the demand of her clients. She rents her home, which is in the Santa Rosa area of the city of El Alto. She is single and doesn't have children. She has been a client of IMPRO since 2008.

loans.use: To buy creams and colognes for men for her business selling cosmetics.

loans.name: Nilo

texts.es: El señor Nilo vive el localidad de el Torno  convive con su pareja padre de 1 hija pequeña, su actividad es de el servicio de transporte urbano (taxi) es muy importante saber que para nuestra satisfacción el cliente lucha para darle una mejor forma de vida a su familia la actividad que el realiza es diaria y tiene una competitividad grande en el mercado pero aun así el cliente lleva en su mente el crecimiento personal,  gracias al crédito otorgado por la institución emprender el cliente puede realizar su trabajo sin ningún riesgo  de parar y dejar de llevar la alimentación de cada día a su casa y familia, ya que el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de motor y para una soldadura de su vehículo,  el rendimiento que tiene el cliente es bastante valorado por el crecimiento del mismo.
texts.en: Nilo lives in the town of El Torno. He lives with his partner and is the father of a little girl. He runs an urban transportation service (taxi). It is very important to know that this client is fighting to give his family a better standard of living. He works every day and the market is very competitive, but, even so, he always keeps his personal growth in mind. Thanks to the loan awarded by Emprender, he can carry out his work without risk of having to stop and not being able to provide for the daily needs of his family. He will use the loan to buy a motor and welder for his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy a motor and a welder.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es: El señor Arturo tiene un pequeño taller donde elabora cotillones para fiestas de cumpleaños y otras ocasiones. El crédito lo requiere para comprar materia prima: cartulina, papeles de distintos colores, pegamentos, así podrá  aumentar su capital de trabajo. Vive en alquiler en una casa  ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz;  es viudo y tiene un hijo.
texts.en: Arturo has a small workshop where he makes party decorations for birthday parties and other occasions. He needs the loan to buy raw materials: posterboard, differnt colored paper, and glue. In this way, he will be able to increase his working capital. He llives in a rented house in the Alto San Pedro area of the city of La Paz. He is a widower and has one child.

loans.use: to buy posterboard, colored paper, and glue for his business making party decorations.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
Bertha tiene 38 años de edad vive con su esposo y 3 hijos en casa de su familia, que se encuentra ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de La Victoria en Chiclayo. Esta familia no cuenta con los servicios básicos de luz, agua y desagüe. 

La actividad principal de la comunidad, de Bertha, es la agricultura y la ganadería. El esposo de Bertha es peón realizando labores agrícolas. Por otro lado Bertha cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en la crianza de animales menores (patos, pavos, gallinas, cuyes) y además realiza  faenas agrícolas, junto a su esposo. La crianza de animales le reporta buenos ingresos a Bertha, lo que le permite ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar.

Bertha solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles que desea utilizar para el arreglo de su casa. Con este dinero y el dinero que su esposo ha ahorrado Bertha podrá comprar calaminas y otros materiales para mejorara los interiores de su hogar.
texts.en:
Bertha is 38 years old.  She lives with her husband and three children in her family's home which is located in the rural area of La Victoria district, in Chiclayo.  This family does not have basic services of electricity, water and sewerage.

The main business activities in Bertha's community are farming and livestock raising.  Bertha's husband is an agricultural laborer.  Bertha has 10 years experience raising animals (ducks, turkeys, hens and guinea pigs).  She also carries out farm work together with her husband.  The livestock raising makes Bertha good profits which allow her to help her husband with their household expenses.

Bertha is requesting a loan for 500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which she would like to use to fix up her home.  With this money and some money that her husband has saved up, Bertha will be able to buy corrugated metal sheets and other materials to improve the inside of her home.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal sheets to fix up her home

loans.name: Larem

texts.es: Larem trabaja como empleada en una empresa de venta de computadoras y tiene un vehiculo el cual lo conduce su padre como taxi. El crédito lo requiere para comprar un motor nuevo y el cambio de llantas para su taxi, pues es la principal fuente de ingresos que tiene para cubrir los gastos de su hogar. Vive en anticretico ubicado en la zona de Alto Miraflores de la ciudad de La Paz; es soltera y no tiene hijos pero ayuda a su padre. Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Larem works in a business that sells computers and has a vehicle that her father drives as a taxi. The loan will be used to buy a new engine and to change the taxi's tires. It is the main source of income to cover household expenses. She lives in a home located in the Alto Miraflores area of the city of La Paz. She is single and has no children, but she helps her father. This is the first time that she has worked with IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy an engine and change the tires on the taxi she owns.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es: El Sr. Simón se dedica a la fabricación de anillos, hace treinta años, el fabrica  anillos de diferentes   modelos de acuerdo a los pedidos que le hagan, el Sr. Simon tiene 59 años, Vive la Zona del Plan 3000, tiene cinco  hijos a su cargo ya que tres trabajan y los otros le ayudan con los que aceres de su negocio,  sus horarios de trabajo son de 7 de la Mañana  a 8 de la noche,  los trabajos terminados los entrega a las joyerías  mercado del plan 3000 y de algunas joyerías del mercado de los pozos. Actualmente el necesita el crédito para comprar Barras de gramos de Oro y de plata. Su Esposa se dedica a Atender su tienda la que esta ubicada en su propio domicilio. Son personas responsables, el Sr. Simón es una persona muy trabajadora, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Simón works making rings. For thirty years, he has made rings in different models according to the orders he receives. He is 59 years old and lives in the Plan 3000 area. He is raising five children. Three of them work and the others help with the work duties. His work schedule is from 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. He delivers his work to jewelry stores in the market in Plan 3000 and to some jewelry stores in the Los Pozos market. At present, he needs the loan to buy gold and silver gram bars. His wife runs her store, which is located in their own house. They are responsible people. Simón is a very hard working person and is grateful to the institution for the support it has offered.

loans.use: to buy gold and silver gram bars.

loans.name: Maria Nelly

texts.es:
Hace 2 años, a raíz de la separación con su esposo Maria Nelly decidió montar su propio negocio en compañía de su hermana, elaborando, vendiendo y distribuyendo comida por los barrios cercanos a su vivienda ubicada en la ciudad de Medellín, departamento de Antioquia. Ella es reconocida entre sus vecinos por tener una buena sasón al momento de realizar las diferentes recetas.

 

Maria Nelly elabora los alimentos y su hermana se encarga de llevarlos a domicilio en una bicicleta, sistema que les ha impedido tener puntualidad al momento de entregar los pedidos, su negocio les ha generado hasta ahora bueno ingresos, pero saben que para que éste sea cada vez más grande y les genere mayores utilidades necesitan otro medio para transportar los productos, por lo que han ahorrado dinero algún tiempo para invertirlo en una moto, sin embargo aún no les es suficiente, y necesitan un préstamo para dicha inversión puesto que cada vez son más sus clientes y proporcionalmente sus pedidos. 

 

Maria Nelly y su hermana sueñan algún día con tener un negocio reconocido no sólo en su barrio y sectores aledaños si no también en el resto de la ciudad, donde puedan distribuir sus productos, y atender todo tipo de eventos especiales.
texts.en:
Two years ago, after separating from her husband, Maria Nelly decided to open her own business with her sister making selling, and distributing food in the nearby neighborhoods in the city of Medellín, departament of Antioquia. She is well known among her beighbors for being a good cook while trying new recipes. 
 
Maria Nelly makes the food and her sister is in charge of delivering them door to door on her bicycle. This system has impeded them from having punctual deliveries. They know that for this to grow and to make more income, they need another way to transport the products. They have been saving their money for awhile to invest in a motorcycle, but it has not been enough. They need a loan for this investment to have more and more customers and orders.  

Maria Nelly and her sister dream of having a business one day that is known not only in their neighborhood, but in the rest of the city, where they can distribute their product and cater all types of events.

loans.use: to buy a motorcyle to transport product.

loans.name: German

texts.es: El señor German, tiene trabaja como chofer manejando un microbús y su esposa es comerciante. El crédito lo requiere para aumentar el capital del negocio de su esposa para que compre cajas de chocolates, bolsas de café molido y paquetes de pañales desechables; también realizara un mantenimiento  de su vehiculo, que es la fuente de donde genera ingresos para ayudar a mantener su familia Vive en alquiler la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Las Lomas de la ciudad de La Paz;  es casado y  tiene dos hijos. German es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2007 y tiene un excelente historial de pagos.
texts.en:
German works as a microbus driver and his wife is a saleswoman.  He needs a loan to help increase his wife’s working capital so that she can buy boxes of chocolates, bags of ground coffee, and packages of disposable diapers.  He also wants to have maintenance service done on his vehicle which is a source of income to support his family.  He lives in a rented house located in Las Lomas area of La Paz and he is married and has two children.  German has been a client of IMPROV since 2007 and he has an excellent repayment history.
.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as chocolates, coffee, and disposable diapers for his wife's sales and to have maintenance service done on his vehicle that he uses to transport passengers.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge D. 38 años es soltero,vive en las casa D. sus padres, L. cual cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en en L. zona urbana D. L. provincia D. Chiclayo.  Se caracterizaporquesus pobladores desarrollan como  actividad principalel comercio D. todo tipo D. productos al por mayor y menor, turismo y en las zonas cercanas L. agricultura.
Jorge desD. hace unos 4 años se dedica  a L. venta D. repuestos D. moto, lubricantes  y al servicio D. enllante y desenllante, el lugar donD. tiene su negocio es alquilado, está ubicado en un sitio estratégico (al frente del  terminal terreste), espor eso que clienteL. no le falta  y todos los servicos que brinda ylos repuestos que venD. le permite contar con ingresos diarios para poder solventar su gastos y necesidades.
Al observar que su negocio está prosperando ha creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más repuestos no sólo D. moto sino también D. carros y adquirir diferentes tipos lubricantes, al implementar su negocio con más mercadería, va poder tener mayor cantidad D. clienteL. y tener más ganancias para mejorar L. calidad D. vidad e él como L. D. sus padres.  Jorge es una persona responsable, trabajadora y un buen hijo que siempre trata D. ayudar a sus padres económicamente para que no les  falte nada.
texts.en:
Jorge is 38 years old, single, and lives in his parents' home which has all basic services.  It is located in the urban area of Chiclayo province.  This area is noted for the fact that the main business activity of its residents is buying and selling all types of products both wholesale and retail.  They also work in tourism and, in nearby areas, they work in agriculture.

For four years, Jorge has been selling motorcycle spare parts and lubricants, and providing tire services.  He rents his business premises which are located in a strategic location (opposite the bus station).  For this reason, he does not lack customers and all the services that he provides and the spare parts that he sells allow him to make the daily income he needs to cover his expenses and needs.

Noting that his business is prospering, Jorge has decided to request a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can buy more spare parts, not only for motorcycles but also for cars.  He would also like to buy different types of lubricants so that he can stock his business with more merchandise.  He will be able to serve a larger number of customers and make more profits so that he can improve his own and his parents' quality of life.

Jorge is a responsible, hard-working person and a good son who has always tried to help his parents financially so that they don't want for anything.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts for motorcycles and other vehicles, and also lubricants, to stock his business

loans.name: Celso

texts.es:
Celso es un padre de familia 48 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo e hijos, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en elcaserío los Zapatas que  pertence al distrito de Tambogrande,que se encuentra a unos 40 minutos de distancia del departamento de Piura.  Las cuales  desarrollan la actividad agricola, ganadera, artesana de sus pobladores.

Celso se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas) y porcino  (cerdos), su corral se encuentran en la parte posterior de su casa.  A sus animales les proporciona alimentos  balanceados como pastos naturales y una vez que estos han llegado a su desarrollo óptimo los ofrece a la venta a los pobladores de ese distrito como también lo comercilaiza a otras personas foraneas o llevandolos a vender los distintos mercados. Otra actividad que también realiza es la agricultura, ya que cuenta con unos terrenos donde siembra mango y cacao y una vez que cosecha los oferta en los distintos mercados de la zona.

El préstamo solicitado por Celso a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1000 nuevos soles, para comprar alimentos balanceados para brindarles una buena alimentación a sus animales y seguir ofertandolos para incrementar sus ingresos por tener un ganado sano y de calidad, con el único fin de poder sacar a sus  hijos adelante dándole una mejor calidad de vida.  Celso como padre responsable y trabajador, quiere que toda su familia se supere y tenga otras oportunidades.
texts.en:
Celso is a 48 year-old father who lives in his own home together with his wife and children.  The only service his home has is electricity.  It is located in the small village of Los Zapatas, in Tambogrande district, 40 minutes from Piura department.  The locals farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

Celso raises and sells sheep and pigs.  His farmyard is located behind his home.  He feeds his animals balanced feed and natural pasture.  Once the animals have reached an optimum level of development, he offers them for sale to the residents of his district.  He also sells them to people from outside the area or takes them to different markets to sell.  Celso also farms crops.  He has some plots of land where he grows mangos and cacao.  When he harvests his crops, he sells them in different markets in the area.

Celso is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use the money to buy balanced feed so that he can provide his animals with good nourishment and continue selling them.  He will increase his profits as his animals will be healthy and good quality.  His sole aim is to get his children ahead and provide them with a better quality of life.  As a responsible and hard-working father, Celso would like his whole family to improve themselves and benefit from other opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of balanced feed for his animals

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda de 27 años es madre de familia, vive en casa propia con sus hijos, cuenta con todos los servicio básicos,  ubicada en el distrito de Chepen, que se encuentra a unas 2 horas de distancia del departamento de la Libertad (Trujillo)y a una hora de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Todas éstas zonas  se caracterizan por la actividad agricola, ganadera y turismo.

Hilda se dedica a la venta de ropa en forma ambulatoria, desde hace 4 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado cerca al mercado de la ciudad de Chepen, lugar donde existe mayor afluencia de personas y así su negocio tiene mayor acogida de clientes, permitiéndole tener ingresos para solventar los gastos familiares.

A observado Hilda que su negocio cada día va creciendo y ha solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1200 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadría y más surtida, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, de una manera responsable  con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo.
texts.en:
Hilda is a 27 year- old mother who lives in her own home with her children.  Her home has all the basic services and is located in Chepen district, two hours from La Libertad (Trujillo) department and one hour from Chiclayo province.  All of these areas are noted for the fact that their residents work in agriculture, livestock raising and tourism.

Hilda sells clothes as an itinerant vendor.  She has been in this business for four years and her business is located near Chepen town market.  This is a very busy place and so her business has a lot of customers.  This allows her to make income with which to cover her family expenses.

Hilda has noticed that her business is increasing every day and so she has requested a loan for 1,200 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy a larger quantity and variety of merchandise so that her customer numbers continue to grow.  This will enable her to repay her loan and improve her family's quality of life in a responsible way, with a lot of effort and hard work.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise and stock her business

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre soltero de 40 años, vive en casa de sus padres que cuenta con servicio de agua y luz solamente y está ubicado  en la zona urbana de la provincia de Chiclayo. Lugar que se caracteriza por su gran actividad comercial, agricultura y turismo.

Carlos desde hace 5 año se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan en forma ambulatoria , ésta actividad lo realiza en las afueras de un hospital de esta ciudad, tiene buena demanda de clientela desde muy temprano,ya quemucha gente asiste a sus citas médicas.  A pesar que se tienque movilizar desde muy temprano trata de que su negocio cresca cada vez más para poder ayudar con los gastos en su casa.

El préstamo solicitado por Carlos a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1700 nuevos soles para mejorar los servicios higiénicos de su casa para brindarle mejor seguridad y limpieza a su familia, evitando cualquier tipo de enfermedad por no tener un baño apto para el uso de su familia .  Además Carlos con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo trata de darle algunas comodidades a su familia y seguir tratando de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Carlos is 40 years old and single.  He lives in his parents' home which has piped water and electricity.  It is located in the urban area of Chiclayo province.  This area is noted for its commerce, agriculture and tourism.

For five years, Carlos has been making and selling bread as an itinerant street vendor.  He carries out his work outside a hospital in the city.  He has good customer demand from very early in the morning since a lot of people are attending their medical appointments.  In spite of the fact that he has to start working very early in the morning, Carlos is trying to continually grow his business so that he can help with his household expenses.

Carlos has requested a loan for 1,700 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use this money to improve the bathroom facilities in his home so that he can provide better safety and cleanliness for his family.  With a lot of effort and hard work, Carlos tries to provide his family with some comforts and continues trying to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to improve his home's bathroom facilities

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “VIRGEN DE GUADALUPE - CUSCO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Jimmy, el socio tiene 25 años de edad;  el socio es soltero, el socio es analista de sistemas, el trabaja en la empresa de visanet, es una services. El socio es soporte técnico de dicha empresa, el socio desea graduarse y para ello requiere el crédito para pagar los derechos de su graduación. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en el pago de derechos para acceder a la graduación de sus estudios y obtener el título profesional.

El socio esta agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank, "VIRGEN DE GUADALUPE - CUSCO" is located in the District of Huanchac, belonging to the Province of Cusco, Department of Cusco.

The member is Jimmy, 25 years old, and unmarried.  He is a systems analyst at the company VisaNet, an electronic payment processing network.  Jimmy provides technical support at VisaNet.  He wants to graduate and needs a loan to pay dues upon graduation.  Jimmy is requesting the loan to pay fees to access the graduation of his studies and obtain a professional title.

Jimmy is grateful and will pay back the loan in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: To invest in paying dues for graduation.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.es: Emmanuel V. Marín, tiene la edad de 31 años, está soltero  y vive con sus 2 hijos y su señora que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el dinero comprar más abarrotes para su pulpería y surtirla aun más. El quiere llegar a tener un negocio más surtido para incrementar sus ventas y aumentar su clientela para así poder generar más ganancias para su bienestar y la de su familia. El tambien quiere dar un mejor servicio de atencion y mas mercaderia a disposicion de sus compradores. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Emmanuel V. Marín is 31 years old and unmarried.  He lives with his ​​2 children and his partner, who are his top priorities.  He intends to use the loan to buy more groceries for his grocery store and stock it further.  He wants to have a business with more choices to increase sales and increase his customer base in order to generate more profits for his welfare and his family. He also wants to provide better customer service and have more merchandise available to his guests.  This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't had prior loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given a loan with great convenience and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy groceries.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Komi Anoumou

texts.fr: Tailleur de profession depuis 1996, Anoumou est marié et père de 02 enfants avec sa femme qui est une ménagère. Il a 37 ans et s’adonne à la couture avec passion. Ce premier crédit dans notre institution va lui permettre d’acheter des tissus sur place pour confectionner des habits car la majorité de sa cliente préfère le «  déjà fait » c'est-à-dire le prêt à porter. C’est un homme déterminé à satisfaire les besoins de sa maisonnée du moins dans la mesure du possible.
texts.en:
A tailor by profession since 1996, Anoumou is married and the father of 2 children with his wife, who is a housekeeper. He is 37 years old and devotes himself to sewing with great enthusiasm. 

This first loan from our institution will allow him to buy fabric locally to make clothes as most of his customers prefer "ready made," or "ready-to-wear." He is determined to meet the needs of his family, at least to the very best of his ability.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro S. Agüero, tiene la edad de 32 años, está casado  y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el dinero aumentar el inventario a su posesión, el cuenta con una distribuidora a su posesión. El quiere dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y generar las ganancias para seguir creciendo con su empresa.  El pretende generar una mejor calidad de vida para su bienestar y generar un base consolidada de su empresa para ser de distribución el al zona sur. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Alejandro S. A. is 32 years old, married and lives with his wife who is his top priority. This loan is intended to increase the inventory in his possession.  He has a distributor for the inventory. He wants to better serve customers and generate earnings to keep growing with his business. He intends to build a better life for his welfare and to generate a consolidated base in his company for distribution in the south.  This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't had prior loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given a loan with great convenience and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to expand his inventory.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan S. Delgado, tiene la edad de 66 años, está casado  y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el dinero comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal y ponerlo a producir en mejores condiciones. El quiere mejorar sus producciones en calidad como en cantidad y crecer con su negocio como persona y como caficultor. El cuenta con el terreno en producción lo cual hará es solo asistirlo con abono para mejorar la próxima cosecha. Su meta es generar ganancias para su bienestar y seguir creciendo como caficultor.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Juan S. Delgado is 66 years old and married.  He lives with his wife, who is his biggest priority.  He intends to use this loan to buy inputs for his coffee plantation, to put it in better production condition.  

He wants to improve the quality and quantity of production, and to grow his business as a person and as a coffee grower.  Juan counts on the land to produce, which he only helps by fertilizing to improve the next harvest.  

His goal is to generate earnings for his well being, and to keep growing coffee.  This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  Juan has not had any loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him this loan with the most ease and the lowest interest rate.

loans.use: purchase agricultural inputs for his coffee plantation.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Andrey

texts.es: Andrey U. C., tiene la edad de 21 años, está soltero  y vive con sus padres. El pretende con el dinero comprar los insumos para la fertilización de su cafetal y ponerlo a cosechar en mejores condiciones. El cuenta con el terreno sembrado y quiere asistirlo bien pues en estos momentos es precio de café está en muy buenas condiciones de pago. El quiere generar ingresos para su futuro y su bienestar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja
texts.en:
Andrey U. C. is 21 years old. He is single and lives with his parents. He hopes to use this loan to buy agricultural inputs that will be used to improve the condition of his coffee plantation. Andrey has already planted his farm and wants to do everything he can to increase his crop yield, since the price of coffee is high right now.

The income from farming coffee will be used to help Andrey prepare for the future. This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He has never taken a loan from a formal bank, but FUDECOSUR offers credit more easily and at a lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs for his coffee plantation.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es: Rodolfo Ramírez Solís, tiene la edad de 46 años, está casado  y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposa. El pretende con el dinero comprar los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su cafetal y aumentar la producción. El cuenta con el terreno y lo que quiere es mejorar su producción para así obtener mejores calidades  de producción. El quiere generar los ingresos para su bienestar y la de su familia y crecer como caficultor de la zona. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rodolfo Ramírez Solís, 46, is married and lives with his three children and his wife.  He intends to use the money to buy necessary farming supplies for his coffee crops to increase production.

He has a field and what he wants is to improve production in order to obtain better quality harvests.  He wants to generate income for his family’s wellbeing and to grow as a coffee producer in the zone.

This is the first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He hadn’t had any previous loans with state banks but FEDECOSUR has provided a loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Vecinos Victoriosos Group

texts.es: La señora Victoria C. Faustina vive en la Flor Distrito de Carabayllo tiene 48 años, es casada y tiene 04 hijos empezo con el negocio ayudando al inicio a su madre quien vendia frente a su casa en un complejo deportivo luego con el pasar de los años ya su mami no podia salir a vender asi que la señora Victoria empezo a vender ella sola. Entre los productos que vende estan la rica papa rellena, cachanguitas, canchita, etc., Con su prestamo va a invertir en comprar mas insumos. Su sueño es poder tener una gran bodega.
texts.en: Mrs. Victoria C. Faustina, 48, lives in La Flor, Carabayllo District.  She’s married and has four children.  She started the business helping her mother who sold at a sports complex across the street from her house .  With the passage of time, her mother was unable to continue selling so Victoria started to do so by herself.  Among the products she sells are stuffed potatoes, “cachanguitas” (fried dough sprinkled with sugar), “canchita” (Peruvian popcorn), etc.  She will use her loan to buy more ingredients.  Her dream is to have a large store.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for the sale of savory dishes.

loans.name: Vannesa

texts.es:
Los deseos de Vannesa de progresar han sido el motor que la impulsan a trabajar día a día en su propio negocio, venta de mercancía, la cual se ha convertido de gran ayuda puesto que para poder continuar con sus estudios al mismo tiempo debe generar ingresos debido a que su familia no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para apoyarla en su proceso formativo. 

Con apenas 20 años, Vannesa es una luchadora y aunque sus jornadas son extenuantes porque además de dedicar el tiempo necesario a su estudio para cumplir con los trabajos y demás actividades, al culminar su jornada debe dedicarse a sus ventas, pues es la única manera de materializar su sueño de ser profesional y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Aunque en sus compañeros de estudio y profesores, Vannesa encuentra clientes potenciales, normalmente debe rebuscarse nuevos clientes para generar ingresos mensuales. 

Actualmente Vannesa necesita de un préstamo para empezar a implementar nuevos productos en su negocio, esta vez desea iniciar con la venta de relojes debido a que frecuentemente sus clientes se lo piden, así logrará incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Vannesa’s wish to progress has been the motor that pushes her to work daily in her own business: merchandise sales.  It has turned out to be of great use because it allows her to continue with her schooling while earning income since her family does not have the necessary resources to help her during her formative process.

At the mere age of 20, Vannesa is a fighter and, although her days are exhausting because beside having to dedicate time to her studies to do all her assignments and other activities, at the end of the day she has to dedicate herself to her sales because this is the only way of making her dream of becoming a professional a reality and to improve her quality of life.  Although she finds potential customers among her classmates and teachers, she must still seek out new customers to generate monthly income.

Vannesa needs a loan now to start adding new items to her business.  This time she wants to start selling watches because her customers frequently request them.  She will thus increase her income.

loans.use: to buy watches.

loans.name: Flor María

texts.es:
Aunque Flor María G. es oriunda de Urabá, desde hace tres años se vio obligada a dejar su tierra en compañía de sus tres hijos debido al desplazamiento forzado por grupos al margen de la ley, desde entonces y como madre cabeza de hogar debió dedicarse a su propio negocio con el propósito de subsistir en Medellín, una ciudad para ella y su familia desconocida. 

Flor lucha incansablemente para sacar adelante su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida pero el invierno se ha convertido en una gran dificultad pues al estar expuesta al sol y al agua ello le implica comprar una carpa que le permita mejorar sus condiciones. 

En el futuro esta emprendedora espera llegar a tener un restaurante que le permita mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Although Flor María G. is originally from Urabá, she and her three children were forced from their land three years ago by local thugs. Since then, she has dedicated herself to her business activities in order to support her family in Medellín, a city which she still doesn't know very well. 

Flor struggles tirelessly to advance her business and improve her family's quality of life, but the winter season is difficult for her as a food vendor because she is exposed to the sun and the rain. She hopes to buy a tent to protect herself from the weather. In the future, Flor hopes to open a restaurant that will generate better income.

loans.use: To purchase a tent.

loans.name: Martha Liliana

texts.es:
A sus 37 años de edad y con 7 hijos a carga por ser madre cabeza de hogar, Martha Liliana V. P. es una luchadora incansable. Desde muy joven ha trabajado en diferentes sectores y a pesar de las dificultades económicas por las que ha tenido que atravesar siempre ha salido adelante gracias a su dedicación y esfuerzo. 

Después de trabajar durante algún tiempo en un restaurante, Martha supo que este oficio podría convertirse en su propio negocio, oportunidad que le permitiría no sólo generar sus propios ingresos sino estar más cerca de sus hijos. Actualmente esta emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para comprar una carpa que pueda adaptar a su carrito de comidas rápidas y comprar insumos para ampliar su capacidad de producción. 

El sueño de Martha es poder tener un local propio que le permita ofrecer mayor variedad y convertir sus comidas rápidas en un producto reconocido en Medellín.
texts.en:
At the age of 37 and with 7 children in her care because she’s a head of household mother, Martha Liliana V. P. is an untiring fighter.  From a very early age she has worked in a variety of jobs and, despite the economic difficulties she’s had to pass through, has always gotten ahead thanks to her dedication and effort.

After having worked for a time in a restaurant, Martha discovered that this occupation could become her own business, an opportunity that would make it possible not only for her to generate her own income but also to be closer to her children.  This entrepreneur currently needs a loan to buy a tent that can be adapted to her fast food sales cart and to buy ingredients to increase her productive capacity.

Martha’s dream is to have a locale of her own that will allow her to offer greater variety and turn her fast food into a renowned product in Medellín.

loans.use: to buy a tent, install it on her fast food sales cart and to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Rubén Darío

texts.es:
Cansado de trabajar durante muchos años por días sin encontrar un empleo estable que le permitiera estabilizarse económicamente y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia conformada por su esposa y su hijo, desde hace tres años decidió crear su propio negocio, una legumbrería que ha podido sacar adelante gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo brindado por un amigo, quien en su tienda le facilitó el espacio a Rubén para que montara su legumbrería. 

A sus 45 años de edad, el sueño de este emprendedor es llegar a tener su propio local en el que pueda ubicar una gran legumbrería reconocida en el municipio de Santa Bárbara Antioquia de donde es oriundo.  

Por ahora y para caminar hacia la materialización de su sueño, Rubén necesita de un préstamo para comprar una estantería nueva que le permita exhibir mejor las frutas y verduras y así mejorar la apariencia del negocio.
texts.en:
Tired of working for many years for days without finding a stable job that would allow financial stability and improve the quality of family life, three years ago Ruben decided to start his own business of a produce stand.  His family consists of his wife and child.  He has been able to move forward with his business thanks to the effort and support provided by a friend, who in his shop provided him the space to set up his produce stand.

At 45 years old, this entrepreneur's dream is to own his own store in which he can put in a great produce stand that will be recognized in the municipality of Santa Bárbara, of his native Antioquia.

For now, and to continue towards the realization of his dream, Ruben needs a loan to buy a new shelf that allows him to display more fruit and vegetables and improve the appearance of the business.

loans.use: to purchase shelves for displaying fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Amarilis Del Establo Group

texts.es: La señora Luciola O. tiene 44 años y es casada, tiene tres hijos los cuales ya son mayores D. edad pero aun viven con ella en casa.  Se dedica desD. hace muchos años al bordado D. polos para damas y niñas. Primero empezo recibiendo polos para bordar D. una amiga, poco a poco ella se fue interesando mas en el negocio y decidio ir a los mismos talleres donD. fabrican polos para ofrecer sus servicios D. bordados, desD. esa fecha a la actualidad ella tiene gran cantidad D. clientes y a la vez ella brinda trabajo a otras personas, ya que trae gran cantidad D. polos para ser bordados y lo reparte a otras mujeres que necesitan a poyar en casa economicamente. Su sueño es  poder tener su propio taller D. fabricacion D. polos.
texts.en: Mrs. Luciola O., 44, is married and has three adult children that still live at home with her.  She has embroidered women’s and girl’s shirts for many years.  She started out embroidering shirts she’d get from a girl friend but little by little became more interested in the business and decided to visit the same workshops where the shirts are manufactured to offer her embroidery services.  Since then and to the present day she has a great amount of customers and also offers her services to other people because large amounts of shirts are brought to her to be embroidered and she distributes them among other women who need to support their households economically.  Her dream is to have her own shirt manufacturing workshop.

loans.use: to buy embroidery supplies.

loans.name: Norbey Adolfo

texts.es:
Oriundo del campo, Norbey Adolfo R. se siente feliz de haber nacido en una familia humilde campesina que le enseñó a trabajar la tierra, por ello, desde muy pequeño aprendió los oficios propios de la agricultura lo que le ha permitido generar los ingresos básicos para sostener a su familia pues aunque hace poco se casó y aún no tiene hijos, todavía le ayuda a sus padres a cubrir sus gastos. 

Actualmente en un pedacito de tierra, Norbey cultiva café, plátano, fríjo y maíz, además cuenta con un criadero de cerdos de engorde con el fin de generar mayores ingresos y aunque sus jornadas laborales son extensas desde tempranas horas, este emprendedor trabaja con la convicción de ampliar su negocio hasta poder adquirir una finca grande que le permita mejorar su calidad de vida. 

Por ahora, Norbey necesita de un préstamo para comprar concentrado para sus cerdos y así lograr precios más bajos al adquirir mayor cantidad.
texts.en:
Native of the countryside, Norbey Adolfo R. feels happy to have been born into a humble, peasant family that taught him how to work the land.  Because of this, from a very young age he learned farming skills that have made it possible for him to earn basic income to support his family. Even though he married recently and does not have children yet, he still helps his parents cover their expenses.

Currently, Norbey farms coffee, bananas, beans and corn on a small plot of land.  He also raises pigs to earn additional income.  Although his work days are long starting very early in the day, this entrepreneur works committed to expanding his business until being able to acquire a large farm that will allow him to improve his quality of life.

For now, Norbey needs a loan to buy feed for his pigs so that he can buy it for a lower price by buying in large amounts.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Mollecato Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “MOLLECATO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Augusta; ella es viuda y tiene 49 años y tiene 6 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de compra y venta de maíz,trigo,arveja y papa y también se dedica a la crianza de animales y tiene un terreno donde siembra papa y maíz, los animales y las verduras lo vende en el mercado de Urcos desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de maíz,trigo,arveja y papa y también de crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales y para comprar fertilizantes para la tierra de cultivo.


Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de crianza de animales, venta de tejas, compra y venta de granos secos y negocio de venta de comida.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "MOLLECATO," which is located in the district of Urcos, belonging to the province and department of Cusco Quispicanchis.

The featured member is Augusta, 49 years old, who is a widow and has 6 children.  She works in the business of buying and selling corn, wheat, pea and potatoes and is also devoted to raising animals.  She has land where she plants potatoes and corn.  She sells animals and vegetables in the market Urcos from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm.   Through this business, she raises her children.  Augusta wants to expand and improve the business of selling corn, wheat, peas and potatoes and animal husbandry.  She is requesting a loan to buy animals and to buy fertilizer for farmland.

The other partners are in the business of raising animals, selling tiles, purchasing and selling dried beans and selling food.

Augusta thanks those who are part of this dream through this loan and agrees to comply with the payment of her dues on time.

loans.use: to buy animals and fertilizer for farmland.

loans.name: Dos De Febrero Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “DOS DE FEBRERO” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por diez integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Fanny. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: costura de enaguas, mercadería de golosinas, costura de deportivos, negocio de papa, tienda de barrio, venta de CD’s veta de comida.

La señora Fanny,  indica que este es el primer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de golosinas por mayor, que inicio conjuntamente su esposo. Nos cuenta que un día estaban paseando por la Ceja y decidieron comprar golosinas y poco a poco fue aumentando su negocio; ahora lo reparten por mayor y pedido.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (de golosinas), que compraran por mayor de la ceja y los venderán todos los días por las mañanas y por las tardes con la ayuda de su esposo.. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación en salud.
texts.en:
The “Dos de Febrero” (February 2) communal bank will start its second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata Center.  It has 10 members and is led by a governing board headed by Fanny.  The businesses the members carry out are varied.  Among them are: dressmaking, snack sales, sportswear making, potato sales, neighborhood store, CD sales and food sales.

Fanny indicates that this is the first cycle she’s worked with Pro Mujer; a girl friend invited her to join.  She currently has a wholesale snack sales business that she started with her husband.  She tells us that one day they were passing through Ceja and decided to buy snacks gradually increasing their business.  Now, they sell wholesale and on order.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase capital (snacks) that they will buy at wholesale in Ceja and then sell very day during the morning and afternoon with her husband.  This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family in whatever way is possible; she is married and has two children.

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the health training.

loans.use: to buy snacks.

loans.name: El Puente Group

texts.es:
el grupo El Puente esta ubicado en el barrio los Jazmines Trojes El Paraiso, esta integrado por tres personas que poseen negocios propios y que tienen mucha experiencia en la administración de los mismos, se conocen muy bien ya que todos viven cerca uno del otro, tomaron la decision de formar el grupo con el propósito de solicitar un credito para invertirlo en sus negocios, ya que por no contar con garantías suficientes no son sujetos de crédito en la banca nacional. el credito lo utilizaran para comprar mas mercaderia y asi satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, esto les permitira mejorar sus ventas y así obtener mayores ganancias para mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus familias.
Dilcia tiene una pulperia, Iris vende leña y tortillas y Mario tiene una pulperia.
texts.en:
The group El Puente is located in the neighborhood Jazmines Trojes El Paraiso and is comprised of three people who own their own businesses and have a lot of experience in administration of them.  They know each other very well since they all live near one another. They decided to form the group in order to apply for a loan to invest in their businesses, because they do not have adequate guarantees and are not subject to national banking credit. The loan will be used to buy more merchandise to meet the demand of their customers.  This will enable them to improve their sales and thus have profits to improve the lives of their families.  

Dilcia has a grocery store, Iris sells firewood and tortillas and Mario has a grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase beans, rice, sugar, butter, oil, salt, meat, ice cream, firewood, corn, toilet paper, sanitary napkins, churros, soft drinks, and juices.

loans.name: Jaime De Jesús

texts.es:
Jaime de Jesús A. G. es un luchador incansable pues además de trabajar por días en algunos restaurantes del municipio de Santa Bárbara al suroeste de Antioquia como mesero, en la parte trasera de su casa ubicó algunos corrales para el engorde de cerdos, negocio que le ha permitido mejorar los ingresos para él, su esposa y su hija y aunque como él mismo lo afirma no son muchas las ganancias por lo menos tiene la tranquilidad de contar con los recursos para cubrir sus necesidades básicas. 

Poder construir un mejor corral donde pueda ampliar el número de cerdos de engorde con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos para brindarle a su hija la oportunidad de estudiar en la universidad es el sueño de este emprendedor que trabaja día a día para lograrlo. 

Actualmente, Jaime de Jesús necesita de un préstamo para comprar concentrado para alimentar sus cerdos lo que le permitirá nutrirlos mejor y así recibir un mejor pago por ellos.
texts.en:
Jaime de Jesús A. G. is an untiring fighter who, aside from working days as a Waiter in some of the restaurants in Santa Bárbara in southwest Antioquia, has also set up some corrals in his back yard to raise pigs, a business that has allowed him to improve income for himself, his wife and his daughter and, like he himself states, profits aren’t many but at least he has the peace of mind knowing that he can count on sufficient resources to meet basic needs.

To build a better corral to increase the number of pigs he raises with the goal in mind of improving income to provide his daughter with the opportunity to go to university, this entrepreneur works hard daily to attain this dream.

Currently, Jaime de Jesús needs a loan to buy concentrated pig feed that will lead to improved nutrition and better prices for them.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Santa Rosa De Collana Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SANTA ROSA D. COLLANA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Erika Maritza; ella es casada y tiene 27 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio D. transporte y también la socia trabaja en una fotocopiadora desD. las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,la socia también se dedica a la crianza D. animales como pollos y cuyes y el negocio D. transporte tiene un carro que hace servicio D. taxi, por medio D. estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el servicio D. taxi. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para sus animales y para el mantenimiento D. su carro.


Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio D. venta D. juguetes, venta D. comida, negocio D. servicio D. taxi, negocio D. crianza D. animales y agricultura.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “SANTA ROSA D. COLLANA” communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province, Cusco Department.

The member is Erika Maritza, 27.  She’s married and has two children.  She works in transportation and also at a photocopying center from 7am until 8pm.  In addition, she raises animals like chickens and guinea pigs.  In the transportation business she has a car that provides taxi services.  Through these businesses she is able to support her children.  She wants to expand and improve the taxi service and is asking for a loan to buy animal feed and to service her car.

The other group members sell toys, food, proviD. taxi services, raise livestock and farm.

She is grateful to those who share her dream through this means and commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and to service her car.

loans.name: Eduard Yesid

texts.es:
La falta de recursos para continuar con sus estudios motivó a Eduard Yesid R. R. a darle vida a su propio negocio. Motivado por las ganas de salir adelante y por la necesidad de contribuir  a cubrir los gastos del hogar, este joven emprendedor decidió empezar a vender productos por catálogo a sus amigos, vecinos y conocidos, pero sus aspiraciones van allá pues en el futuro espera tener un gran almacén que sea reconocido. 

Por ahora y empezando a dar los primeros pasos para cumplir sus sueño, Eduard necesita de un préstamo para comprar una vitrina y sus primeros productos para la venta, así irá construyendo paso a paso su futuro.
texts.en: A lack of resources for continuing his studies has motivated Eduard Yesid R. R. to bring his business to life.  Motivated by the will to get ahead and by the need to contribute toward the expenses of the home, this enterprising young man decided to begin to sell products through a catalog to his friends, neighbors, and acquaintances.  However, his aspirations extend further and in the future he hopes to have a big department store that will be well-recognized.  Right now he is beginning to take the first steps toward fulfilling his dream.  Eduard needs a loan to buy a display cabinet and his first products to sell.  In this way, little by little, he will build his future.

loans.use: To buy a display case and personal care products to begin his business

loans.name: Victor  Bacilio

texts.es: El Sr. Víctor es un comerciante muy emprendedor que en compañía de su esposa atienden una tienda de abarrotes que le pusieron por nombre "Estanquillo Diana" en honor a su hija , con  el  transcurso del tiempo las  ventas han ido   mejorando día a día, solo que les hacen falta unos productos que sus clientes les solicitan, y como el se preocupa por  otorgar  un excelente  servicio  al  cliente en esta  ocasión  requiere surtir  mercancía  para  su negocio, agradece   el  apoyo  brindado  para   realizar   su proyecto.
texts.en: Víctor is a very enterprising merchant who, together with his wife, run a grocery store they called “Estanquillo Diana” in honor of their daughter.  As time has passed, sales have improved daily.  They only lack a few of the items their customers request.  Because he strives to provide excellent customer service, on this occasion he needs to stock merchandise for his store.  He is grateful for the support provided for his project.

loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Monte De Sion Group

texts.es:
el grupo monte de sion esta ubicado en La Redonda Jamastran, esta integrado por tres mujeres las cuales tienen negocios propios y tienen mucha experiencia en la administración de los mismos, se conocen muy bien viven en la misma comunidad, han tomado la decision de formar el grupo denominado monte de Sion con el propósito de solicitar credito para la compra de mercaderías para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, teniendo bien surtidos sus negocios les permite tener mejores ganancias, asi mismo las vuelven a invertir en sus negocios para ir logrando el crecimiento de los mismos y de igual manera cumplir con los compromisos y gastos familiares, cabe mencionar que son mujeres muy emprendedoras y con deseos de salir adelante en la vida.

Santos Eulalia se dedica al comercio vende ropa nueva, calzado, ropa interior, cosméticos  verduras y granos básicos,  sus ventas las realiza de contado y al crédito en las diferentes aldeas y caseríos aledaños a su domicilio, con las ganancias que su negocio le genera apoya a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.

Petronila tiene una pulperia y Yadira vende cosmeticos.
texts.en:
The Monte de Sion (Mount Zion) group is located in La Redonda Jamastran.  It’s composed of three women who have their own businesses and much experience running them.  They know each other very well and live in the same community.  They have made the decision to form a group called Mount Zion with the goal of requesting a loan to buy merchandise to meet customer demand.  

Having their businesses well stocked allows them to earn better profits which they reinvest in their businesses thus attaining their growth as well as being able to meet family expenses and other obligations.  It’s worth mentioning that they are very enterprising women with a strong desire to get ahead in life.

Santos Eulalia sells new clothes, shoes, underwear, cosmetics, vegetables and basic grains. Sales are made by cash and credit in the various communities surrounding her home. With her earnings she is helping her husband to pay for their home expenses.

Petronila has a grocery store and Yadira sells cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, clothes, cosmetics and basic grains.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, breeze blocks, zinc, iron, and wire.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Después de aprender el oficio de las confecciones en talleres realizados, al quedar embarazada y tener que asumir su rol de madre cabeza de familia y debido a la falta de oportunidades laborales, Sandra Patricia G. C. se vio en la necesidad de empezar a trabajar como independiente confeccionando diferentes prendas a sus conocidos, vecinos y familiares. 

Con el paso del tiempo su negocio se ha ido acreditando, lo que le ha permitido incrementar sus ventas y debido a ello necesita comprar una máquina plana que le permita agilizar sus procesos y cumplirle a sus clientes, como no cuenta con el capital suficiente para hacerlo, Sandra necesita de un préstamo. 

A sus 36 años de edad, en el futuro, Sandra espera hacer de su taller de confección una gran empresa que no sólo le permita mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su hija sino también generar empleo.
texts.en:
Sandra Patricia G. C. learned how to make clothing in established workshops. Upon becoming pregnant and needing to assume her role as mother and head of household, and due to the lack of work opportunities, she saw the need to start working independently making different kinds of garments for people she knew and for neighbors and family members.

With the passage of time, her business has been getting a good reputation, which has allowed her to increase her sales.  Due to this, she needs to buy a sewing machine that will let her speed up her processes and fulfill her obligations to her customers.  Since she doesn't have sufficient capital to do this, Sandra needs a loan.

Sandra is 36 years old. In the future, she hopes to make her workshop a large business that will not only allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her daughter, but will also generate employment.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine to make clothing

loans.name: Warmin Antawipa Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “WARMIN ANTAWIPA” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Maria Luz. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos comercio, producción y servicio 

La señora María Luz,  indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer  por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio que consiste en una tienda de abarrotes, el que viene trabajando hace dos años y medio, aprendiendo este negocio de su mamá. Ella cuenta que el monto con el que inicio fue de 500bs. Dinero que poco a poco fue haciéndolo crecer.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumento de su mercadería (compra de fideo, azúcar, verduras, etc.) que adquirirá de las mayoristas de la Garcilazo  de la Vega (calle comercial de la ciudad de La Paz) y los venderá todos los días en su tienda de 6:00am hasta las 12:00pm. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

En la foto no aparese la señora Martha,se no tovo una buena pose.
Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta sus beneficios, los ahorros y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
The credit association "WARMIN ANTAWIPA" began its second cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Villa Exaltacion Center. It is made up of 8 members and is directed by a board headed by Maria Luz. The association members' businesses are varied and include commerce, production and service.

Maria Luz joined Pro Mujer two years ago at the invitation of a friend. Currently she has a grocery store where she has been working for 2 1/2 years. She learned the business from her mother. She tells us that she started with 500 bolivianos, money which little-by-little she has made grow.

The loan that she will take out now is to increase her merchandise by purchasing noodles, sugar, vegetables, etc from the wholesalers in the Garcilazo de la Vega (a commercial street in the city of La Paz). She will sell her products every day in her store from 6:00am until 12:00pm. This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her family as much as possible, since she is single and has 2 children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she enjoys the benefits, the savings and the trainings. 

Martha does not appear in the photograph, she didn't have a good pose.

loans.use: to increase merchandise (noodles, rice, sugar)

loans.name: Darlyn Margarita

texts.es:
Este cliente es originaria del poblado de la mina el limón, es casada de profesión Licenciada en Enfermería, tiene  
 Hijos los cuales estudian en los colegios de la localidad,  actualmente esta laborando en el centro de salud de la misma población, con 25 años de servicios ahora ocupando el cargo de Director del mismo desde hace 2 años, ha sido cliente de la empresa con 4 financiamiento recibidos y este ultimo atravez del convenio con el mismo centro del que ella representa, dichos financiamientos les han ayudado a mejorar sus condiciones y nivel de vida.
texts.en:
This borrower is originally from the town of La Mina El Limon. She is married and is a licensed nurse. She has children who study in the local schools. Currently, she works in the health center in her town which has been in service for 25 years. For 2 years now she has been the director of the center.

This is the fourth loan that she has received and the last one was made through an agreement with the same center that she works for. The loans have helped her to improve her living conditions and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cinder-blocks, rebar, cement, stones and laborers.

loans.name: María Rosalba

texts.es:
A sus 63 años de edad y después de trabajar durante años en una fábrica de confecciones, María Rosalía C. J. se quedó desempleada, situación que la obligó a crear su propio negocio. Con su máquina ubicada en su casa, sus manos y las ganas de seguir adelante para cubrir sus necesidades básicas, esta emprendedora empezó a confeccionar diferentes prendas de vestir sobre medida. 

María Rosalía espera seguir adelante con su negocio, ampliar su clientela y así mejorar sus ingresos. Actualmente esta emprendedora requiere de un préstamo para comprar insumos y telas lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
María Rosalía C. J., age 63, was left unemployed after many years of working in a clothing factory. This was the situation that has led her to start her own business. With nothing but her hands, a home sewing machine, and the desire to move forward, this entrepreneur started to manufacture various kinds of made-to-order articles of clothing.

Maria hopes to keep moving forward with her business, expanding her client base and increasing her income. Currently, she is seeking a loan to purchase fabric and other supplies that she needs in order to increase her sales.

loans.use: To purchase fabric and other other supplies

loans.name: Siloe 2 Group

texts.es:
el grupo Siloe 2 esta ubicado en la colonia los Pinos de la ciudad Capital, esta integrado por tres mujeres las cuales tienen mucha experiencia en la administracin de sus negocios, se conocen muy bien ya que viven en la misma comunidad, han formado el grupo con el propósito de solicitar un credito para la compra de leña, cal agua maiz, zapatos y ropa, asi lograr el crecimiento de sus negocios.
Lidia se dedica a la venta de ropa, Guillermina se dedica a la venta de zapatos y Dunia se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas.
la meta de estas tres mujeres es hacer crecer sus negocios para obtener buenas ganancias y asi darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The group Siloe 2 is located in the neighborhood of Los Pinos in the city of Capital. It is made up of three women who have a lot of experience running their businesses. They know each other very well since they live in the same community, and have formed the group with the purpose of asking for a loan to buy firewood, quicklime, water, corn, shoes and clothing, and thus to achieve growth in their businesses.

Lidia sells clothing; Guillermina sells shoes; and Dunia makes and sells tortillas. The goal of these three women is to make their businesses grow so that they can earn good incomes and give their children better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy firewood, quicklime, water, corn, shoes and clothing.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana is a private entrepreneur from Pavlograd. She owns a grocery store selling food items and frozen fish in the central marketplace of her home town. Svetlana offers only fresh and quality merchandise. She has been in the market for 10 years and has 2 hired employees. 

Svetlana is seeking a loan of 20,000 UAH to purchase a variety of food items for her grocery store and to increase her sales and income as a result. Svetlana is hoping to invest the generated income to purchase a van to transport all the store's supplies. She believes it will be a wise and efficient investment in further developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of food items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Fatima Del Socorro

texts.es: Este cliente es originaria de la comunidad el Hatillo es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 3 años, actualmente vive en león, su profesión es maestra de primaria y esta laborando en el colegio de hermita de dolores en león, donde tiene 5 años de ejercer esta profesión, con la empresa lleva 8 financiamientos recibidos para mejoras de vivienda y desarrollo familiar los cuales le han permitido mejorar sus condiciones y nivel de vida, ya que dicha inversión va dirigida para la compra de cerdos de desarrollo y compra de chinero para el hogar , la accesibilidad para llegar a su  centro de trabajo le es bastante favorable ya que le queda a 150 mts de distancia las que recorre saliendo a las 6 de la mañana para estar puntual con su horario normal.
texts.en:
The borrower is originally from the community of El Hatillo. She is married and has a 3-year-old son. Currently she lives in León. She works as a primary school teacher at the school Hermita de Dolores in León, where she has been for 5 years. 

She has received 8 loans with this business to make improvements to her home and for family development, which have allowed her to improve her living conditions and quality of life. This loan will go toward the purchase of developing pigs and a china hutch for her home. 

Her job is very convenient to her home, since it is only 150 meters away. She leaves at 6am to arrive on time for her normal schedule.

loans.use: to buy developing pigs and a china cabinet.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, vive con dos hijos: Wilber de 15 años y Yulisa de 13 años de edad, doña María se dedica a la venta de verduras, su horario es de 6:00am hasta las 2:00pm, los días de comercio domingo y miércoles, los demás días de la semana vende riguas y tamales de elote, tiene 29 años de estar en este negocio y lo aprendió de su familia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar verduras,  y de esta manera surtirlo de productos frescos  como papas, repollo, pipianes, güisquiles, y más que son demandados por los clientes.
Ella quiere trabajar arduamente con el apoyo del préstamo, pagar puntualmente y con esta ayuda ir mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María lives in Corinto, in the department of Morazán. She lives with her two children, Wilber, who is 15 years old, and Yulisa, 13 years old. María sells vegetables. Her schedule is from 6:00am to 2:00pm on market days, Sunday and Wednesday. The other days of the week, she sells corn pancakes and fresh corn tamales. She has been in this business for 29 years and learned it from her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy vegetables so that she can stock her business with fresh products such as potatoes, cabbage, squashes, chayote squashes, and other items that are in demand from customers.

She wants to work hard with the help of the loan, repay punctually, and improve conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as potatoes, cabbage, squashes, and chayote squashes.

loans.name: Nadezhda

texts.en:
Nadezhda is married with two teenage children. She is a farmer from Vodyanoye, where she grows early spring vegetables in her garden and greenhouses. Nadezhda owns 2 land lots and 6 big arched greenhouses. She has been running her farming business for 9 years and has invested about 90,000 UAH in her business. Her annual expenses on seeds and polyethylene film amount to 45,000 UAH.  

Nadezhda is seeking a loan of 7,000 UAH to purchase an irrigation unit for her garden, which will ensure reasonable and efficient water management. One of her long-term plans is to construct a new greenhouse on her land and continue expanding her business as a result. Note: This is a seasonal loan that will be repaid in 3 months.

loans.use: to purchase an irrigation unit for her garden.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Israel, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, él es viudo, vive únicamente con su hija Vicky de 14 años de edad, Israel se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, aprendió por su padre el proceso agrícola  desde hace 35 años.
Él sembrara una manzana de terreno de maíz y frijol, para lo que solicita un préstamo y poder comprar abono y fertilizantes, será una gran ayuda para él, pues contara con una nueva cosecha, se asegura de la alimentación de su familia y el excedente lo venderá, para sacar mejor provecho de la producción.
