Jovita is a member of the “AMANECER ANTEÑA” community bank which is located in Anta district, in Anta province, in Cusco department.

Jovita is 47 years old, married, and has four children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery store business.  Jovita sells staples such as rice, sugar, noodles, etc.  Her husband runs a bakery and together they get their children ahead in life.  Jovita works in her grocery store from 7.00am to 6.00pm.  She would like to expand her grocery business and the bakery business. 

Jovita is requesting this loan to buy goods for the bakery and products for her grocery store.  She is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy bakery items and products for her grocery store

loans.name: Komi Vilagnon

texts.fr: Jeune père de 26 ans, Komi est marié à une revendeuse et ont un enfant.lui même est revendeur de friperie dans un quartier de lomé.il à démarré son activité en 2007 et s’approvionne à Lomé dans un marché de friperie (Hédzranawoé) et revend  à tout ceux  qui lui  font appel .toutefois il aimerait agrandir son étalage c’est pour cela qu’il nous sollicite pour ce premier crédit  pour satisfaire les besoins de sa petite famille.
texts.en:
A young 26-year-old father, Komi is married to a retailer and together they have a child. He is a retailer of used clothing in one of the Lomé neighborhoods. He began this business in 2007 and obtains his supplies in Lomé at a market for used clothes (Hédzranawoé), re-selling to anyone who may need him.

He would like to expand his display area , and this is the reason for asking us for this first loan in order to meet his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy second hand clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk wholesale

loans.name: Joel

texts.es:
Joel padre de familia de 36 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposa y su  hijo, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz en el caserio de Chacupe bajo ubicado en el distrito de la Victoria y a la vez pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Los pobladores de éste distrito se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

Joel  se dedica a la actividad agrícola desde hace varios años aproximadamente, este trabajo lo realiza en los terrenos que tiene, siembra camote de diferentes especies y alfalfa, una vez que se dé la cosecha los podrá vender en los diferentes mercados de su distrito para poder cubrir sus necesidades diarias. Otra actividad que realiza es la crianza de ganado vacuna (vaca) y una vez que estén su desarrollo óptimo lovende a los comerciantes de su zona.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 2000 nuevos soles y su destino será para comprar más semilla de camote y dar mantenimeinto a sus cultivos de alfalfa , para poder sembrar en sus tierras de cultivo y así pueda incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Joel es un hombre muy respetado y conocido en el caserío de Chacupe por ser trabajador, responsable y buen padre, con el único fin de que a su familia no le falte nada.
texts.en:
Joel is a 36 year-old father who lives in his own home with his wife and son.  His home has piped water and electricity and is located in the small village of Chacupe Bajo, in La Victoria district, in Chiclayo province.  The residents of this district work in farming and livestock raising.

Joel has been farming for several years.  He carries out his work on farmland that he owns.  He sows different types of sweet potato and alfalfa.  When he has harvested his crops, he is able to sell them in the different markets in his district.  This enables him to cover his daily needs.  Another business activity that Joel is engaged in is raising cattle (cows).  Once they have reached an optimal level of development, he sells them to traders in his area.

Joel has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use the money to buy more sweet potato seeds and look after his alfalfa crop so that he can sow his land and thereby increase his income and improve his family's quality of life.

Joel is a very well-known and well-respected man in the village of Chacupe because he is hard working, responsible and a good father whose only goal is to ensure his family doesn't want for anything.

loans.use: to buy sweet potato seeds and look after his alfalfa crop

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es: La señora Santusa es agricultora y produce hortalizas. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de semillas de zanahorias, nabos, remolachas, etc., para continuar con su negocio de producción de hortalizas de donde genera sus ingresos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la población de Río Abajo en el departamento de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que canalizamos su crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Santusa is a farmer and grows vegetables.  She will use the loan to buy seeds for carrots, turnips, beets, etc. for her vegetable business which is how she gets income.  She lives in her own house in the town of Rio Abajo in La Paz department.  She is married and has two children.  This is the second time she has channeled a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: To buy turnip, beet and other seeds for her business of growing and selling vegetables.

loans.name: Enna Marisela

texts.es:
Enna, resiD. en San Francisco Gotera, departamento D. Morazán, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, posee una tienda D. productos D. primera necesidad, está ubicada en su casa D. habitación ofrece arroz, maíz, frijoles, boquitas, dulces y por las tardes venD. pupusas.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. granos básicos, aceite, embutidos; esta compra le ayudara a mantener mayor variedad en su tienda y brindar un mejor servicio a los clientes.
Su objetivo es trabajar para sus hijos, que estos estudien y se superen.
texts.en:
Enna lives in San Francisco Gotera, in Morazán department, together with her husband and two children.  She has a store where she sells essential household products which is located in her home.  She sells rice, corn, beans, snacks, sweet treats and, in the afternoons, she sells pupusas.

Enna is requesting a loan to buy basic grains, oil and cold meats.  This purchase will help her to maintain a variety of products in her store and proviD. a better service to her customers.

Enna's goal is to work for her children.  She would like them to study and improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, oil and cold meats

loans.name: Magaly

texts.es: Magaly tiene 28 años, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Heber de 28 años y fruto de esa relación tienen 02 hijos Magaly de 07 años y Natalie de 02 años de edad, a quienes desea brindar una buena educación para que tengan un mejor porvenir. Magaly y su pareja manifiestan que ambos tiene mucho proyectos por concretar, hace tres años que invirtieron sus ahorros para comprar toda clase de repuestos y lubricantes para todo tipo de vehículos. Es así que se dedica al negocio de estos productos, por lo que indican que le va muy bien y le es muy rentable. En ocasiones tiene mucho clientes por atender, es ahí donde su pareja la apoya, además que le enseña todo por cuanto debe atender y complacer a los clientes, puesto él tiene suficiente experiencia reparando vehículos. Le gusta su negocio, es que a pesar de obtener buenas ganancias no deja de lado a sus amistades es por ello que es muy querida por sus vecinos. Los planes que tiene en mente es seguir creciendo económicamente y con el transcurso del tiempo es abrir otra sucursal de ventas en otros distritos. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y está dispuesta a hacerlo. Agradece a la institución por concederle el préstamo. Con el crédito solicitado es para la adquisición de repuestos y lubricantes para su tienda.
texts.en:
Magaly is a hard-working 28 year-old woman.  She lives in her own home together with her partner, 28 year-old Heber, and their two children: 7 year-old Magaly and 2 year-old Natalie.  She would like to provide a good education for her children so that they can enjoy a better future.

Magaly and her partner both have plans to carry out many projects.  Three years ago they invested their savings in buying all kinds of spare parts and lubricants for all types of vehicles.  Magaly works in her business selling these products.  She says that it is doing very well and is very profitable.  Sometimes she has a lot of customers to serve and so her partner supports her.  He also teaches her how she should serve and please their customers.  He has experience repairing vehicles.

Magaly enjoys her business.  In spite of making good profits, she doesn't neglect her friendships.  For this reason, she is very well liked by her neighbors.  Magaly has plans to continue growing financially and, over time, she would like to open another sales branch in another district.  This is Magaly's second loan from MFP.  She knows that she must make her repayments on time and she is prepared to do this.  She is grateful to the institution for granting her the loan.  She will use the loan she is requesting to acquire more spare parts and lubricants for her store.

loans.use: to acquire more spare parts and lubricants

loans.name: Manuel Alejandro

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre soltero de 21 años de edad, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual  es propia y cuenta con todos los servicio ( agua, luz y desagüe) en el distrito de Tambogrande, ubicado a una hora del departamento de Piura.  Los pobladores de éste distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Manuel  maneja su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) desde hace 1 años aproximadamente, está actividad lo realiza en su mismo distrito, apesar de la gran cantidad de personas que realizan el mismo trabajo, el trata en lo posible desde muy temprano movilizar una buena cantidad de pasajeros a sus diferentes destinos, y así tenga mayor cantidad de ingresos para solventar sus gastos y necesidades.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1500 nuevos soles y su destino será para el mantenimiento y cambio de algunos repuestos que necesita su mototaxi para seguir brindando un buen servicio a su clientela y mejorar la calidad de vida de él y la de sus padres.
Manuel es una persona responsable y conocido en su distrito  por ser trabajador  y buen hijo por estar al pendiente de lo que le hace falta a sus padres.
texts.en:
Manuel is 21 years old and single.  He lives in his parents' home which they own and which has access to all services (piped water, electricity and sewerage).  It is located in Tambogrande district, one hour from Piura department.  The residents of this district work in farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Manuel has been driving a motorcycle taxi (a mode of transport that is used for traveling short distances and which holds a maximum of three people) for approximately one year.  He carries out this work in his own district.  In spite of the large number of people who carry out the same work, Manuel tries to get up very early so that he can transport a large number of passengers to their different destinations in order to make more income which he can use to cover his expenses and needs.

Manuel has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use this money to have maintenance work done on his motorcycle and also to buy some spare parts that it needs.  In this way, he will be able to continue providing a good service to his customers and improve his own, and his parents', quality of life.

Manuel is a responsible person who is well known in his district for being hard working and a good son who is always alert to his parents' needs.

loans.use: to have maintenance work done on his motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, cheese and condiments.

loans.name: Eustaquio

texts.es: El señor Eustaquio es artesano dedicado a la confección de chamarras. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de telas, cierres, hilos, forros y otros insumos para continuar con esta actividad, la cual solventa los gastos de su familia. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Alto Tacagua de la ciudad de La Paz;  es viudo  y tiene dos hijos. Es cliente de Impro desde el año 2006.
texts.en: Mr. Eustaquio is an artisan who makes handcrafted jackets. He needs this loan in order to purchase fabric, zippers, thread, lining, and other supplies to continue with this business, which helps him cover the family expenses. He lives in his own home located in the Alto Tacagua zone of the city of La Paz. He is a widower who has two children. He has been a member of Impro since 2006.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, zippers, and lining for his jacket business.

loans.name: Foli Mawulolo

texts.fr: Jeune homme marié de 35 ans, Foli et sa femme sont tous les deux agents commercial des produits ‘’FOREVER ‘’.ils sont  parents de 03 enfants.il  revend de manière ambulante  ces produits. Il a commencé cette activité depuis 2008 et s’approvisionne au siège de’’ FOREVER LEAVING PRODUCT’’ .il sollicite ce premier crédit  dans notre institution pour acheter un vidéo projecteur et un portable pour pouvoir mieux parler de ses produits à ses clients et favoriser la vente car plusieurs personnes s’intéressent à la chose mais aimerait voir des reportages des clients qui en parlent .Ce qui lui faciliterait les ventes et majorer son revenu  mensuel .
texts.en:
A young married man of 35, Foli and his wife are both sales representatives for "Forever" products. They have three children. They sell these products as itinerant vendors; they began in 2008, and they get their supplies at the "Forever Leaving Product" headquarters.

They are seeking their first loan in order to purchase a video projector and a laptop computer. They will be able to make a better presentation of their products to their customers and make more sales, as many people are interested but would like to see testimonials from customers. This would make selling easier and increase their monthly revenue.

loans.use: to buy a computer and a video projector

loans.name: Jorge Aquileo

texts.es:
Jorge, de 32 años de edad, es agricultor, es padre de dos hijos, es originario de la comunidad el Níspero localizada en Condega municipio de Estelí .El siembra granos básicos desde los 12 años de edad este oficio se lo enseño su papa , el cual murió cuando Jorge tenia 8 años de edad. Por tal motivo no pudo seguir estudiando, solo llego hasta segundo grado de primaria  pues necesitaba ayudar a su familia, buscar como sobrevivir. Así ha venido luchando por salir adelante trabajando arduamente, el pudo hacer su casa , por medio de unos trabajos temporales que hizo fuera de Nicaragua , el estuvo en Costa Rica trabajando gracias a esos esfuerzos es que construyo su casa. 
El solicito el préstamo para sembrar de frijol  y maíz. El espera sacar una buena producción con altos rendimientos que le permita vender a buen precio el quintal de maíz y frijol, pues desea seguir sembrando mas, darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Su próxima meta es compra un pedazo de tierra para ampliar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Jorge, age 32, is a farmer and father of two. He is originally from the Níspero community, located in Condega, in the municipality of Estelí. He has been growing staple grains since he was 12 years old, having learned this skill from his father, who passed away when Jorge was 8 years old. For that reason, he was unable to continue his studies, so he was only able to complete second grade because he had to help out his family and look for ways to survive. Just like this, he has been struggling to get ahead by working arduously. He was able to build his own house because of some temporary work that he did outside of Nicaragua. He worked in Costa Rica, and thanks to his efforts, he was able to build his house.

He requested this loan in order to be able to plant beans and corn. He hopes to obtain a good harvest, which will allow him to sell the quintal (46kg) of corn and beans at a good price. He hopes to cultivate more, and to give his family a better quality of life. His next goal is to purchase a plot of land in order to expand his crop fields.

loans.use: to plant beans and corn.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
Felicita D. 58 años D. edad, tiene casa propia, en la cual vive con unos familiares, tiene servicios D. agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito D. Jayanca a unos 30 minutos del departamento D. Lambayeque.  Esta zona  se caracteriza por tener una mucha actividad agricola, ganadera, artesanía y turismo .

Felicita ha acondicionado en una parte D. su sala D. su casa un espacio para poner su negocio donD.  venD. toda clase D. productos para uso personal (ropa para todas las edades y calzado ), tiene su propia clientela que le hace pedidos.  La venta D. sus productos incermenta sus  ingresos lo que le permite solventar sus gastos y necesidades.

A solicitado Felicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 2500 nuevos soles para surtir su negocio con mercadería novedosa tanto en ropa como en otros productos, ya que en esta zona son pocas las personas  que se dedican a este rubro, lo que le permite tener exito en su negocio y cada vez cresca más. Con los ingresos D. la venta D. todos sus productos cubriría las cuotas del crédito brindado y mejoraría su calidad D. vida.

Felicita es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y siempre con ganas D. ayudar a las con las que vive.
texts.en:
Felicita is 58 years old and owns her own home where she lives with some family members.  Her home has piped water and electricity and is located in Jayanca district, some 30 minutes from Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for having its farming, livestock raising, handicrafts and tourism.  

Felicita has adapted a space in part of her living room in order to set up her business where she sells all kinds of personal use products (clothes for all ages and footwear).  She has customers who place orders with her.  The sale of her products increases her income which allows her to cover her expenses and needs.

Felicita has requested a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to stock her business with the latest merchandise (both clothes and other products).  There are few people in her area who work in this line of business which allows her to be successful and her business continues to grow.  With the profits that she makes from selling all her products, Felicita will cover her loan repayments and also improve her quality of life.

Felicita is very well known as a hard-working, responsible woman who always wants to help the people she lives with.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Fifonsi Aa1 Group

texts.fr: FIFONSI AA1 est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres habitent ensemble dans le même quartier à Irédé à Cotonou (capitale économique du Bénin). Afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité et de faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupe s'est rapproché de ALIDé, en vue de l'obtention d'un crédit. La représentante du groupe, Célestine (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est née en 1973 à Cotonou. Célestine est mariée à Delphin et est mère de trois enfants, tous scolarisés. Le couple a deux autres enfants à leur charge. Il y a seulement un an que Célestine s'est installée à Irédé, où elle vit avec son mari et son enfant. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Célestine n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Depuis une trentaine d’année, Célestine vend divers produits (conserves, savons, biscuits, etc.) de façon ambulante. Célestine achète ses produits à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. Dans le but de rehausser son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de plus en plus forte de la clientèle, Célestine sollicite, ensemble avec les membres de son groupe, pour la première fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
"FIFONSI AA1" is a group of three individuals living in the same neighborhood in  Irédé in Cotonou (the economic capital of Benin). In order to expand their business and meet customer demand, this group has approached ALIDé  for the purpose of obtaining a loan. The group’s representative, Celestine (raisign her hand in the photo), was born in 1973. Célestine is married to Delphin and is the mother of three children, all of whom go to school. The couple has two other children in its care. 

Célestine settled in Irédé only about a year ago and now lives there with her husband and children. The spouses jointly provide for various family needs. Célestine never attended school. For about 30 years, Célestine has been selling miscellaneous products (canned food, soap, biscuits, etc) as a street vendor. Célestine buys her  wares in Dantokpa, at the international market of Benin. With the goal of expanding her business and better meeting growing customer demand, Célestine and her group members seek their first loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy miscellaneous products (canned food, soap, biscuits, etc).

loans.name: Viterba

texts.es:
Viterba madre D. familia D. 45 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijos, tiene casa propia  con servicio sólo D. luz, ubicado en el distrito D. TambogranD. y a una hora del departamento D. Piura.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Viterba se dedica a la venta D. salchipollo (comida a base hot dog, papas fritas y pollo frito), negocio que lo tiene en su domicilio y atienD. los fines D. semana solamente, ya que esos día es donD. más demanda tiene su producto y cuenta con su propio carrito sanguchero para la preparación del salchipollo.  Otra actividad a la que se dedica es a la crianza y venta D. aves D. corral.  En ambas labores que realiza tiene ingresos económcos que le permite solventar sus gastos D. su hogar.

A solicitado Viterba un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1200 nuevos soles mediante Capital Semilla  para comprar insumos para la preparación D. salchipollo y utensilios que se necesitan tanto para la elaboración como  para servir el producto, alimplementar su negocio con material nuevo, le va a permitir brindara su clientela un mejor servicio, por lo mismo podrá cobrar un mejor precio y así sus ganacias se incrementarán para tener un mejor nivel D. vida para ella  y su familia.   Viterba es muy conocida en el lugar donD. vive por la buena atención y el servicio  que brinda a sus clientes, es una persona alegre y muy trabajadora, siempre con las ganas D. seguir superandose.
texts.en:
Viterba is a 45 year-old mother who lives with her husband and children in her own home which only has electricity.  It is located in TambogranD. district, one hour from Piura department.  The residents of these areas work in farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Viterba sells 'salchipollo' (which is maD. from hot dog, fries and fried chicken).  Her business is based in her home and she works in it on weekends only since this is when there is most demand for her product.  She has her own 'carrito sanguchero' (a special cart for frying food) where she prepares the 'salchipollo'.  Another business activity that Viterba is engaged in is raising and selling poultry.  She makes income from both jobs which allows her to cover her household expenses.

Viterba has requested a loan for 1,200 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa through their seed fund.  She will use this money to buy supplies for preparing her 'salchipollo' and also utensils that she needs both for making and serving her product.  Stocking her business with new materials will allow her to proviD. her customers with a better service which means that she will be able to charge a better price and thereby increase her profits which will allow her and her family to enjoy a better standard of living.

Viterba is well known in her area for the good service and attention that she gives her customers.  She is a cheerful and very hard-working person who always wants to continue improving herself.

loans.use: to buy supplies and utensils for making 'salchipollo'

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install flooring in her backyard.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.fr: Jeune femme mariée  de 36 ans, Abravi est mère de 02 enfants de bas âge .tous dans le couple sont revendeur, elle se spécialise de son côté dans la vente de maïs et de charbon de bois. Pour ses besoins de commerce elle voyage sur Badou, une ville située dans la région des plateaux à 252km de la capitale Lomé. Elle est dans sa sixième année de commerce et le fait avec beaucoup de vigueur. Ce premier prêt sera d’une grande aide car elle veut augmenter son stock.
texts.en: A 36-years old married woman, Abravi is the mother of two young children. She and her husband are both vendors. For her part, she specializes in selling corn and charcoal. For her business, she travels to Badou, a city located in the plateau region, 252 km [about 150 miles] from Lomé, the capital city. She has been in this line of business for over five years and puts a lot of energy into her work. This first loan will be of real help for her as she would like to expand her stock.

loans.use: to buy charcoal and corn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase beans, rice, sugar, light bulbs, candles, lard, cooking oil, margarine, bread, cookies, beverages, churros, eggs, soap, soups, pasta, salsa, juice, and milk.

loans.name: Luis Felipe

texts.es: Luis Felipe de 45 años, habita en el barrio de San Antonio. Él posee una pulpería la cual ha tenido durante mucho tiempo. Es un hombre trabajador que lucha día a día para salir adelante y poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Esto lo ha impulsado a solicitar este crédito para tener la capacidad de comprar variedad de productos como arroz, azúcar, golosinas, pan dulce, aceite, papel, detergentes y todo lo necesario para mantener surtida su pulpería y lograr incrementar sus ventas y así poder obtener mayores ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Luis Felipe is a 45-year-old man who lives in the San Antonio neighborhood. He has owned a general store for a long time. He is a hardworking man who struggles every day in order to get ahead and be able to improve his quality of life. This has propelled him to request a loan so that he can purchase a variety of products like rice, sugar, candy, sweet bread, cooking oil, paper, detergent, and everything he needs in order to maintain his store well-stocked and be able to boost sales. This way, he can obtain greater profits, which will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, candy, sweet bread, cooking oil, paper, detergent, and other goods.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy es una madre de familia de  43 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus dos menores hijos en el distrito de Tambogrande – Piura. Esta familia tienes muy buenas referencias personales y muchos deseos de superación. Nancy y su esposo luchan siempre por el buen desarrollo de sus pequeños niños.

 Nancy se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno y ovino los cuales cría para comercializarlos en su zona, especialmente en el mercado de la comunidad. Ella ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Su esposo es agricultor y en esta casa es evidente la buena relación familiar que existe dentro de ella.

Nancy solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado para el engorde de sus vacunos, que le permitirá  venderlos  a un mejor precio  para seguir creciendo en su actividad.

Nancy agradecería mucho este crédito pues estaría contribuyendo al desarrollo económico de su familia.
texts.en:
Nancy is a 43 year-old mother who lives with her husband and two dependent children in Tambogrande district, Piura.  This family has very good personal references and a great desire to get ahead.  Nancy and her husband always work hard for the benefit of their young children.

Nancy raises cattle and sheep to sell in her area, especially in the community market.  She helps her husband with their household expenses.  Nancy's husband is a farmer and the good family relationship that exists between them in this household is very clear.

Nancy is requesting a loan for 800 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed for fattening her cattle.  This will allow her to sell them at a better price so that she can continue growing in her business.

Nancy would be very grateful for this loan as it will help contribute towards the financial development of her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her cattle

loans.name: Titonangba Group

texts.fr: Le groupe TITONANGBA est composé de deux personnes qui vivent toutes dans la même zone géographique à Zongo à Cotonou (capitale économique du Bénin). Ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Roukayatou est celle se trouvant à droite sur la photo. Roukayatou est née en Décembre 1986 à Cotonou. Roukayatou vit depuis sa naissance dans le quartier Zongo. Roukayatou n’est pas marié, mais a un enfant qui est scolarisé et qui vit avec elle. Afin de se prendre en charge et d’assurer les charges de son enfant, Roukayatou achète des cartes de recharge téléphonique en gros et les vend à son domicile. Roukayatou exerce cette activité depuis deux ans. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’augmenter leur chiffre d’affaire et leur revenu, Roukayatou et son groupe sollicite pour une première fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: The TITONANGBA group is composed of two person, who both live in the same geographic area, Zongo, in Cotonou (Benin's economic capital). This group is requesting ALIDe's financial support to increase their level of activity. The group's leader, called Roukayatou, is the woman on the right in the picture. Roukayatou is born in December 1986 in Cotonou. Roukayatou has lived in the Zongo neighborhood since she was born. Roukayatou is not married, but she has a child who goes to school and lives with her. To support herself and provide for her child's expenses, Roukayatou purchases prepaid phone cards wholesale and retails them from her house. Roukayatou has been active in this business for two years. In order to raise their level of activity and to increase their sales and revenues, Roukayatou and her group are requesting a loan from ALIDe for the first time.

loans.use: to purchase prepaid phone cards

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge tiene 29 años de edad es un hombre amable y trabajador que vive junto a sus padres en el distrito de Motupe- Lambayeque. Jorge vive en la zona urbana de Motupe, esta es una zona que cuenta con una gran actividad comercial que está en constante crecimiento. Además, la gente de este distrito se le caracteriza por ser gente pujante.

Desde hace 4 años Jorge trabaja de operador en una embotelladora que provee a la empresa cervecera más grande del Perú. Además, como una ganancia adicional, Jorge se dedica ala comercialización de animales menores (ganado ovino – caprino- porcino y aves de corral).

 Jorge desea mejorar su calidad e vida y con sus dos trabajos ha logrado ahorrar un poco de dinero para construir su vivienda. Sin embargo aún le falta presupuesto para hacerlo. Es por eso que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito  de 1000 nuevos soles, que destinará en la construcción de su hogar.

Jorge es un cliente recurrente de nuestra entidad y estaría muy agradecido, de concederle el crédito, porque lo ayudará a su desarrollo como persona.
texts.en:
Jorge is 29 years old.  He is a kind and hard-working man who lives with his parents in Motupe district - Lambayeque.  Jorge lives in the urban area of Motupe.  This is an area that has a high level of commercial activity and is constantly growing.  In addition, the residents of this district are noted as being strong people.

For four years, Jorge has been working as an operator in a bottling plant which supplies the largest beer company in Peru.  In order to make additional income, he also sells animals (sheep, goats, pigs and poultry).

Jorge would like to improve his quality of life and, through his two jobs, he has managed to save a little money to build his own home.  However, he still lacks the overall budget to do so.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles that he will use to build his home.

Jorge is a repeat client of our institution and he is very grateful for this loan as it will help him to develop as a person.

loans.use: to build his home

loans.name: Ricardina

texts.es: Ricardina, de 38 años, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Efraín de 36 años y fruto de esa relación tienen 03 hijos, a quienes desea brindar una buena educación para un mejor porvenir. Ricardina, es una mujer muy laboriosa, posee un puesto de venta, negocio que le ayuda a salir adelante. Ella es comerciante, tiene una tienda en donde vende productos de primera necesidad que se encuentra ubicado dentro de su comunidad. Su negocio es muy concurrido es así que lo abre desde muy temprano por la mañana, lista para recibir a sus primeros compradores, quienes sabiendo de la variedad de la mercadería que tiene no dudan en comprarle. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes ya que es una de sus habilidades que emplea para ganar mayor cantidad de consumidores. Lleva 05 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es permanecer de pie casi todo el transcurso del día. Con el tiempo piensa incrementar sus ganancias abriendo un pequeño mini Marquet. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, siente que este aporte crédito le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo y esta dispuesta cumplir puntualmente con sus cronogramas de pagos. Con el crédito solicitado comprará más víveres para su negocio y así abastecerse de mercadería.
texts.en: Ricardina is a hardworking 38-year-old woman who lives in her own home with her husband, Efrain age 36, and their 3 children, to whom she wishes to give a good education for a better future. Ricardina is an assiduous woman who runs a stand, and this business helps her get ahead. She is a small business owner who sells basic need items out of a store located in her community. Her business is well-frequented, so she opens very early in the morning, ready to receive her first customers, who will no doubt purchase something because of the wide variety of goods that she offers. What she likes most about her job is conversing with her customers because this is one of the skills that she employs in order to gain more customers. She has been in business for 5 years, and what she considers to be the most difficult aspect of her job is staying on her feet almost all day long. In time, she hopes to increase her earnings by opening a mini market. This is her first loan with MFP. She feels that this loan will help her a lot with her business progress, and she is willing to make her repayments punctually, according her payment plan. With this loan, she will purchase more provisions to restock her business.

loans.use: to purchase products to restock her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase shelving, a display case, work table, refrigerator and flower cutting and arrangement tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new carpeting and rugs, mattresses for nap time, games and light renovations.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for light remodeling, paint, a rolling nut-and-sweets stand, toaster oven and refrigerator for cold drinks.

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.es:
Ermelinda es una señora de 60 años de edad que vive con su esposo en el distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. Ermelinda siempre ha sido una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora,  sus vecinos la conocen por ser una persona amable y siempre dispuesta a ayudar.

Desde hace 5 años Ermelinda cuenta con un negocio de bodega- bazar que esta situado en la sala de su propia casa. La bodega de Ermelinda es una de las bodegas más surtidas de la zona. Ella atiende todos los días y por eso cuenta con una gran demanda y  con una clientela fija. 

Ermelinda solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles, el cual destinará en la compra de un lote de mercadería de artículos de primera necesidad .Esto le permitirá incrementar sus inventarios y por ende las ventas, para seguir creciendo en su negocio.

Ermelinda es ya ha trabajado con nuestra entidad y ha sido puntual en sus pagos.
texts.en:
Ermelinda is a 60 year-old lady who lives with her husband in Tambogrande district - Piura.  Ermelinda has always been a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman.  Her neighbors know her as a kind person who is always ready to help.

For five years, Ermelinda has owned a grocery / general store business which is located in the living room of her home.  Ermelinda's store is one of the best-stocked in her area.  She serves in her store every day.  For this reason, she has a lot of demand and regular customers.

Ermelinda is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use this money to buy a batch of merchandise (essential household products).  This will allow her to increase her inventory and, thereby, her sales so that she can continue growing in her business.

Ermelinda is an existing client of our institution and has been punctual in making her repayments.

loans.use: to buy a batch of merchandise for her business

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth W. is a 49-year-old married lady and a mother of two children aged 24 and 20. She has a clothing sales business located in the busy Kitengela area where there are many businesses and people. She says that the major challenge she has is financial constraints. 

However, she works very hard to keep her business doing well. She is using this loan of 90,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy more clothes to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers. She hopes to grow her business and open a big boutique in Kitengela. She also sees herself buying a plot of land in which she will build a residential house. She describes herself as very hardworking, humble and jovial.

loans.use: to buy inventory for her clothing store

loans.name: Gerardo Manuel

texts.es:
Gerardo es un joven de 21 años de edad, trabajador y con muchos deseos de superación. Vive junto a sus padres en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz en Chiclayo. Este distrito es una comunidad principalmente de comerciantes. José Leonardo Ortiz es una zona que está en constante desarrollo económico y social.

Gerardo se dedica, desde hace 3 años a brindar el servicio de mototaxi. La mototaxi es un servicio de transporte público muy común en el Perú, sobretodo en las pequeñas comunidades; consta de una moto con una cabina en la parte trasera  donde se pueden transportar pasajeros.

Gerardo cuenta con su propia moto para brindar este servicio. Él ya conoce a su clientela y los recorridos de estas. Es por eso que cuenta con una buena demanda lo que le permite tener ingresos para lograr independizarse de sus padres.

Gerardo solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que destinará en la reparación de rodajes de su moto y en darle un mantenimiento total a esta.  

Gerardo estará muy agradecido con este crédito pues le permitirá trabajar sin problemas y lograr su meta. Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales.
texts.en:
Gerardo is a young man of 21.  He is hard working and has a great desire to improve himself.  He lives together with his parents in José Leonardo Ortiz district, in Chiclayo.  This district is mainly a community of traders.  José Leonardo Ortiz is an area that is constantly developing both economically and socially.

Gerardo has been providing a motorcycle taxi service for three years.  Motorcycle taxis are a very common mode of public transport in Peru, especially in small communities.  They consist of a motorcycle with a cabin in back for transporting passengers.

Gerardo owns his own motorcycle, with which he provides this service.  He already knows his customers and their routes.  He has good demand for his services which allows him to make the income he needs to be independent from his parents.

Gerardo is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use this money to repair the wheels of his motorcycle and to have general overall maintenance work carried out on it.

Gerardo is very grateful for this loan as it will allow him to continue working without problems and to achieve his goal.  He has good personal and work references.

loans.use: to repair his wheels and have maintenance work done on his motorcycle

loans.name: Zaira Vanessa

texts.es:
Zaira de  23 años de edad, es soltera, vive con sus padres, tienen casa propia la cual cuenta con los servicios básicos de agua y luz, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Paijan a unos 40 minutos de la provincia de Ascope  y a una hora de distancia al departamento de La Libertad (Trujillo) .  Estas zonas se caracterizan por su alta actividad comercial, agricola, ganadera y turística  que desarrollan sus pobladores.

Zaira a colocado en su casa una bodega donde vende todo tipodeproductos (papel higiénico, huevos, leche,  detergente y todo tipo de golosinas, ropa, gaseosas, sandalias, etc.), con el negocio que tiene en su domicilio trata en lo posible de brindar un mejor nivel para ella y sus padres.

Mediante una visita a Edpyme Alternativa Zaira trata de adquirir un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para abastecer su bodega de más insumos y así pueda seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes, y de paso incrementar  sus ingresos para seguir ayudando en casa.

Zaira es conocida por sus vecinos, por ser una mujer  alegre, trabajadora y con muchas ganas de progresar en la vida .
texts.en:
Zaira is 23 years old and lives with her parents.  They have their own house with basic water and electricity services.  They live in a rural zone in the Paijan district, which is 40 minutes from the Ascope province and one hour from the La Libertad (Trujillo) department.  These zones are known for their high levels of commercial, farming, livestock, and tourist activities engaged in by their inhabitants.

Zaira has established a store in her house where she sells all types of products (toilet paper, eggs, milk, detergent, and all types of sweets, clothes, soft drinks, and sandals, etc.).  With the business that she has in her house she tries to provide a better standard of living for herself and her parents.

By visiting Edpyme Alternativa, Zaire is trying to get a loan for 500 soles in order to stock her store with more supplies.  This way she will be able to continue meeting her customers’ needs.  In turn, this will increase her income so that she can continue helping at home.

Zaira is known by her neighbors to be a happy and hard-working woman who has a great desire to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Susy

texts.es:
La Sra. Susy C. A. es comerciante individual y cuenta con un salón de Belleza que opera bajo el nombre de "Dalias", Susy antes de contar con su propio negocio, trabajaba en un salón de belleza lo que le permito adquirir muy buena experiencia y clientela misma una vez instalando su negocio comenzó a visitarle, sus clientes se sienten muy satisfechos por el servicio que les brinda ya que los atiende con profesionalismo y los productos que se les aplica son de líneas de belleza muy reconocidas.     
Susy utilizara el credito para la compra de productos varios y así surtir para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
El crecimiento en su negocio es notable y expresa sentirse feliz ya que todo le esta saliendo bien.
texts.en:
Ms. Susy C. Alvaregna is a small business owner who runs a beauty salon called "Dalias." Before starting her own business, Susy used to work in a beauty salon, which allowed her to gain lots of experience and build her clientele. Once she set up her own salon, these customers started to frequent it. They are very satisfied with the services that she provides because she attends to them with professionalism, and she uses well-known products.

Susy will use this loan in order to purchase various products so that she can restock her business and meet customer demand.

Her business has grown noticeably, and she feels happy because everything is coming out well.

loans.use: to purchase hair dye, shavers, shampoo, conditioner, scissors, nail polish, towels, lotions, and oils.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline N. is a married lady. She is forty-six years old and hails from Kitengela. Her business is located at a busy area known as Kinanie in Kitengela. She runs a store where she sells fruits and vegetables to the local people. She has been in this business for three years now.

She says that this business is profitable and that the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works very hard to keep her business doing well. She is using this loan of 90,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy more fruits and vegetables to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers.

She hopes to grow her business and become the major fruits and vegetables supplier in the area. She describes herself as very hardworking, determined and focused.

loans.use: Fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Javier Alejandro

texts.es:
Javier es un padre fe familia de 31 años de edad, tiene casa propia y vive con su esposa e hijos, la cual  cuenta con los servicio de agua y luz  en el distrito de Razuri, ubicado a unos 30 minutos de la  provincia de Ascope y a una hora del departamento de la Libertad (Trujillo).  Los pobladores de éste distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y turismo (festividades religiosas que forma parte de las costumbres de los pobladores).
Javier  labora manejando
 su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) desde hace 3 años aproximadamente, está actividad lo realiza en su mismo distrito, apesar de la gran cantidad de personas que realizan el mismo trabajo, el trata en lo posible desde de movilizar una buena cantidad de pasajeros a sus diferentes destinos en todo el día, y así tenga mayor cantidad de ingresos para solventar sus gastos y necesidades de su hogar.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1500 nuevos soles y su destino será para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi y también para cubrir algunos gastos personales, al encontrarse su unidad móvil en buen estado podrá seguir trabajando y brindando un mejor servicio para  mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Javier es un hombre muy responsable, conocido en su distrito  por ser trabajador  y buen padre porque siempre trata que su familia se supere y que sus hijos tengan otras oportunidades que él no pudo tener.
texts.en:
Javier is a 31 year old father.  He has his own house, and he lives with his wife and children.  The house has water and electric services.  It is located 30 minutes from the Ascope province and one hour from the Libertad department (Trujillo).  The inhabitants of this district devote themselves to farming, livestock, and tourism (religious festivals that are customary for the villagers).  

Javier works driving a “mototaxi” (transportation that is used to drive a maximum of 3 people short distances).  He has been doing this for approximately three years.  He works in his own district in spite of the fact that a lot of other people do the same work.  He tries as much as possible to transport a large number of passengers to their different destinations all day.  That way he has a greater amount of income to pay his expenses and for his household necessities.

The loan for 1,500 soles that he has requested from Edpyme Alternativa will be for maintenance on his mototaxi.  He will also use it to cover some personal expenses.  When his mototaxi is in good shape he will be able to continue working and proving better service.  He does this in order to provide his family with a better quality of life.

Javier is a very responsible man.  He is known in his district for being a hard-worker and a good father because he always tries to see that his family prevails and that his children have other opportunities that he was not able to have.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his mototaxi and to pay some personal expenses.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Mère de 04 enfants, akos  est mariée à un mécanicien .elle a 56 ans  et est revendeuse de céréales(mil,maîs,sorgho….)à Lomé et pour ses besoins de commerce se ravitaille sur marché de la place appelée marché d’Akodesséwa .elle fait cette activité depuis 1983 et  a fait preuve de beaucoup de sérieux lors de son premier prêt et ce second prêt lui faciliterait aussi l’achat de plus de céréales.
texts.en: Mother of four children, Akos is married to a mechanic. She is 56 and sells cereals (millet, maize, sorghum, etc.) in  Lomé. She buys her goods at a local market called Akodesséwa. She has been in this business since 1983, and she proved to be a very responsible person during the course of her first loan. This second loan will also make it easier for her to buy more cereals.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Mahoule Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHOULE est formé de trois personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier à Fifadji à Cotonou. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Elisée, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Née en Juin 1982 à Comè au Bénin, Elisée s’est installée au quartier Fifadji, il y a seulement un an. Elisée a un enfant qui est scolarisé. Elisée ne vit plus avec son mari. Afin de se prendre en charge et d’assurer un mieux être à son enfant, Elisée vend de la bouillie de maïs à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Elisée vend des produits de quincaillerie et de la boisson locale. Elisée  s’approvisionne à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. Elisée exerce cette activité depuis une dizaine d’année, ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Elisée désire obtenir un financement, ensemble avec les autres membres de son groupe.
texts.en:
MAHOULE group is composed of three women who live in the same neighborhood at Fifadji in Cotonou. The representative of the group, whose name is Elisée, is the one raising her hand in the photo. This group is asking for financial aid from ALIDé so that they can grow their businesses. Born in June 1982 in Comè, Bénin, Elisée settled in the Fifadji neighborhood just a year ago. Elisée has one child who is enrolled in school. She no longer lives with her husband.

 In order to support herself and ensure a better future for her child, Elisée sells maize porridge out of her home. Secondarily, she sells hardware items and local brew. She buys her goods in Dantokpa, the international market of Bénin. 

Elisée has been in this business for about 10 years, and it allows her to support herself. Wishing to bolster her business and better respond to the demand of her clientele, she wants to obtain a loan, together with the other members of her group.

loans.use: to buy maize, local drink, and hardware.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita es una señora D. 59 años D. edad que vive junto a sus hijos, quienes ya trabajan. Ellos viven en el distrito D. Catacaos – Piura. La zona D. Catacaos es conocida en todo el Perú, por ser una zona D. orfebres, la joyería D. plata es la más común en esa zona. Además,  Catacaos es conocida por su deliciosa comida. 

DesD. hace 10 años Margarita se dedica a vender chicha (bebida tradicional hecha a base D. jora y maíz) y pequeños platos D. comida. Esta actividad la realiza 3 veces a la semana. Parte D. su negocio lo distribuye en la ciudad D. Paita, ubicada a 20 minutos D. Catacaos. Margarita conoce a la perfección su labor y cuenta con clientela fija en ambas zonas. 

La demanda D. Margarita ha aumentado  y ella no tiene el presupuesto necesario para satisfacerla, es por eso que solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra D. maíz, jora y otros insumos que le permitan elaborar los potajes para satisfacer a su nueva clientela. Además con parte del préstamo Margarita podrá darle un mejor acondicionamiento a su negocio.

Margarita desea incrementar sus ventas y obtener mayores ingresos, espera hacerse más conocida a través D. la promoción que le hagan sus clientes actuales.
texts.en:
Margarita is 59 years old.  She lives with her children, and they work.  They live in the Catacaos-Piura district.  The Catacaos zone is known throughout Peru as being a silver smith zone.  Silver jewelry is the most common in this zone.  Catacaos is also known for its delicious food. 

For ten years Margarita has been selling “chicha” (a traditional corn based-drink) and small food dishes.  She does this three times a week.  She distributes part of her products to the city of Paita, which is 20 minutes from Catacaos.  Margarita knows her work to perfection, and she has fixed customers in both zones.

Margarita’s demand has increased, and she does not have the means that are needed to meet the demand.  That is why she is requesting a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to buy corn, dried corn, and other supplies that will allow her to make the drinks to satisfy her new customers.  Margarita will also use part of the loan to be able to refurbish her business.

Margarita wishes to increase her sales and get greater income.  She plans to become more well-known through the endorsements that her current customers make.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for the drinks she makes and to refurbish her stand

loans.name: Senan Group

texts.fr: SENAN est un groupe de deux personnes, dont les membres vivent ensemble dans le même quartier à Xwlacodji à cotonou (Capitale économique du Bénin). La représentante du groupe, Laurette Arlette (qui a la main levée sur la photo), est née en Février 1978 et est mariée à un revendeur nommé Arouna. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés. Laurette Arlette vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari à Xwlacodji. Il y a environs trente trois ans que Laurette Arlette vit dans ce quartier. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Laurette Arlette est une couturière de profession. Depuis sept ans environs, Laurette Arlette  exerce cette activité et vend également dans son atelier des produits de mercerie et des tissus. Laurette Arlette s'approvisionne à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. C'est la deuxième fois que Laurette Arlette sollicite un financement de ALIDé, en vue de renforcer son activité et de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle.
texts.en:
SENAN is a group made up of two persons; both members live in the same neighborhood at  Xwlacodji in Cotonou (the economic capital of Bénin). The representative of the group, Laurette Arlette (who is raising her hand in the photo), was born in February 1978 and is married to a petty trader named Arouna. The couple have two children, both enrolled in school. 

Laurette Arlette lives with her children and her husband in Xwlacodji. She has been living in this neighborhood for about 33 years. The couple share in supporting their family.  

Laurette Arlette is a trained seamstress. For about seven years, she has been working at this trade and she also sells sewing notions and cloth in her workshop. She buys her goods at Dantokpa, the international market of Bénin. This is the second time that Laurette Arlette has requested a loan from ALIDé, aimed at bolstering her business and better satisfying the needs of her clientele. .

loans.use: to buy sewing notions and cloth.

loans.name: Amah Léonie

texts.fr: Revendeuse de mèches et de produits de  beauté depuis plus de 4 ans, léonie a 29 ans et n’a aucun engagement vis-à-vis d’un homme. Toute  son activité commerciale est basée à Lomé.Elle voudrait par ce premier crédit asseoir et renforcer  son activité avant de se lancer dans la vie à deux et avoir plus tard des enfants. Elle tient sa boutique à domicile.
texts.en: Léonie is 29 years old and unattached. She has been selling hair extensions and beauty products for over four years. All her commercial activity is based in Lomé. She would like to grow and strengthen her business thanks to this first loan before settling down, starting a relationship and later having children. She sells her wares out of her home.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and beauty products.

loans.name: Sabas

texts.es:
La Sra. Sabas R. M. es comerciante individual y cuenta con un negocio de venta de productos varios que esta ubicado en una zona estratégica y de mayor comercio en el municipio de El Paraíso, lo que le permite el fácil acceso de sus clientes generándole mayores ventas en el dia, aparte de los productos tambien vende Medicina Natural siendo sus principales clientes las personas de las diferentes aldeas y caseríos vecinos,  los que se ha sabido ganar ya que les brinda un buen trato y les ofrece buenos productos, la experiencia que tiene le permite con facilidad recomendarle determinados productos medicinales a sus clientes.   
La sra. Sabas R. utilizara el credito para la compra de mercaderia al por mayor para surtir de productos su negocio y asi satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ms. Sabas R. M. is a small business owner who sells assorted products in a strategically located commercial area of El Paraíso, which allows her easy access to customers, thus generating better sales. Aside from selling those products, she also sells herbal medicine, her main customers being people from the different surrounding villages, people whom she has been able to win over because of her good customer service and quality products. Her experience allows her to recommend the appropriate herbal products to her customers with ease.

Ms. Sabas R. will use this loan to purchase wholesale merchandise so that she can restock her business, thus allowing her to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to purchase deodorant, talcum powder, bathroom tissue, cosmetics, tooth paste, brushes, hair bands, and hangers.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: La señora Maria De Los Ángeles se dedica a una pulpería. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio, pues ha sido beneficioso para su familia ya que ha podido generar ingresos diarios a su hogar. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de granos básicos, detergentes, golosinas, pan, refrescos, papel, enlatados y sopas.  La ubicación de su actividad es en su vivienda. Siempre ha soñado con ampliar su negocio cada día más y generar ingresos a su hogar.
texts.en: Ms. Maria De Los Angeles has been running a general store for over 5 years, and it has been of great benefit for her family because she has been able to earn a daily income for the household. The loan that she is requesting will be used to purchase staple grains, detergent, candy, bread, beverages, paper, canned goods, and soups. This business is located in her home. She has always dreamt of expanding her business each day and of generating profits for her household.

loans.use: to purchase staple grains, detergent, candy, bread, beverages, paper, canned goods, and soups.

loans.name: Mujeres De La Luna Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa de Gloria F., un integrante del grupo Mujeres de la Luna, que esta ubicado en el Estado de Veracruz en México. La señora Gloria se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado que inicio hace 10 años. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente satisfecha de la oportunidad que le brindan para invertir en su negocio. Tiene 32 años, estudio hasta el nivel medio superior, es casada y tiene un hijo. Quiere este crédito para comprar ropa de temporada y calzado, para hacer crecer su negocio, sus clientes son gente de su localidad y comentan que les gusta mucho la ropa que vende así como los calzados y lo bien que los atiende ya que siempre les entrega todo a tiempo. También espera obtener más ganancias y así darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y educación a su hijo para que logre sus sueños y un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
This photo was taken at Gloria F.’s house, a member of the Mujeres de la Luna (Women of the Moon) group located in the Mexican state of Veracruz.

Gloria started selling clothes and shoes ten years ago.  At the moment of requesting the loan she feels satisfied with the opportunity she’s being given to invest in her business.  She’s 32 years old and studied up high school.  She’s married and has a son.

She wants this loan to buy seasonal clothes and shoes to make her business grow.  Her customers are local people from her community and they comment that they like the clothes and shoes she sells very much and the good way she tends to them because she always delivers everything on time.  She also hopes to gain more profits to provide her family with a better quality of life and education for her son so that he’ll reach his dreams and have a better future.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Jeune femme de 37 ans, Akossiwa est célibataire et n’a aucun enfant en charge et pourtant elle n’entend pas  baisser les bras  au quotidien,  cependant elle tient une boutique d’alimentation générale depuis 1996.pour son activité de revendeuse, elle  s’approvisionne ici à Lomé et revend dans sa boutique qu’elle tient à domicile.
texts.en: A young woman of 37, Akossiwa is single and not raising any children. Nevertheless she does not hesitate to get on with ordinary life, so she has been tending a general store since 1996. For her work as a small-scale merchant, she buys her inventory here in Lomé and sells her wares in her shop located in her home.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items.

loans.name: Binta

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Binta B.. She is married and has three children aged 19, 16, and 13 years. 

In 2005, Binta B. established her plastic slippers and sandals business. She began her business because she wanted to support her husband in contributing financially to the running of the home. "I'm self reliant, independent and I am not a burden to my husband," said Binta. She opens her business seven days a week and 10 hours a day. 

She needs a loan of 5,000,000 Sierra Leonean leones (SLL) in order to buy more stock. In the future, Binta plans to expand her business and become a supplier to other traders and also to have a house for herself. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy bags of plastic slippers and sandals for her business

loans.name: L’Eternel Est Mon Berger Ekpe Group

texts.fr: L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER EKPE est un groupe constitué de sept personnes et dont la présidente (dont le doigt est levé sur la photo) est nommée Bernadette. Les membres du groupe sont des amies et vivent ensemble dans la même localité à Ekpè, dans la commune de Sèmè-Podji.  Née en 1960 à Sèmè-Podji, Bernadette habite Ekpè il y a une dizaine d’année. Bernadette est mère de trois enfants, mais seulement un est à sa charge. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Bernadette ne vit plus avec son mari. Afin de satisfaire ses  besoins et ceux de son enfant, Bernadette prépare de la nourriture (riz, pâte de maïs, etc.) qu’elle vend dans son quartier. De façon secondaire, Bernadette  vend des boissons. Bernadette s’approvisionne à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin et au marché de Sékou. Bernadette  exerce cette activité depuis une vingtaine d’année. C’est la première fois que Bernadette  et son groupe sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, afin d'agrandir leur activité et d'accroître leur chiffre d'affaire et leur revenu.
texts.en:
L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER EKPE (The Eternal One is My Shepherd, Ekpe) is a group made up of seven persons whose president is the lady raising her hand in the photo, Bernadette. The members of the group are friends and live in the same area in Ekpè, in the township of Sèmè-Podji.  Born in 1960 in Sèmè-Podji, Bernadette has been living in Ekpè for some 10 years. She is the mother of three children, but she herself is raising only one of them. Some of these children are enrolled in school. 

Bernadette is no longer living with her husband. In order to support herself and her child, she prepares food (rice, maize porridge, etc.) and sells it in her neighborhood. Secondarily, she sells drinks. She buys her supplies in Dantokpa, the international market of  Bénin and also in Sékou marketplace. Bernadette  has been in this business for some 20 years. This is the first time that Bernadette and her group have asked for a loan from ALIDé, so as to expand their businesses and their sales and thus their income.

loans.use: to buy sacks of maize, rice, and also drinks.

loans.name: Leon

texts.es: Leon tiene 54 años, es un hombre trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a sus tres queridos hijos. Él es viudo,  su pareja falleció hace par de años, pero sus hijos son su mayor fortaleza. Los campos de sembrado que con tanto esfuerzo a conseguido Leon, son el principal sustento que tiene toda su familia, él se dedica a labrar la tierra, ahí cultiva cacao, café, y  raíces de barbasco; sus productos son muy solicitados en los centros de acopio, ya que su fama de cosechar frutos son de muy  buena calidad. Lo que más le gusta es cuidar sus sembríos de la plaga de insectos que pueden perjudicar sus plantaciones, así como sacar la mala hierba que crece en sus campos. Lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los sacos de sus cultivos, ya que son muy pesados y le cansan mucho. En adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar sus cultivos. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo. Agradece a la institución por concederle el préstamo. Es por ello con el crédito solicitado comprará carretillas que le serán de gran utilidad para trasladar sus productos desde la chacra hasta su comunidad.
texts.en: Leon, 54, is a hardworking man who lives in his own house with his 3 beloved children.  He is a widower; his wife died a couple of years ago, but his children are his main source of strength.  The farming lands that Leon has acquired with a lot of effort are the main source of sustenance for his family.  He farms this land, cultivating cocoa, coffee and mullein plants, products that are in high demand in the collection centers, since he is known for harvesting very good quality fruits.  What he enjoys most is to care for his crops to avoid the pests that can damage his plants, and to pull out the weeds that grow on his fields.  He has been farming for 15 years, and what he considers most difficult is to transport his sacks of crops, since they are heavy and this work is very tiring for him.  In the future, he hopes to buy some new lands to increase his cultivations.  This is his second loan with MFP, and he knows that this support will be very beneficial for the development of his work.  He appreciates the institution for granting him this loan.  With the loan he requests, he will buy wheeled carts that will be very helpful to him in transporting his products from the farm to his community.

loans.use: to buy wheeled carts to transport his harvested crops

loans.name: Alda Lucia

texts.es: Alda madre soltera sus hijos estudian en la primaria, mujer trabajadora como madre el bienestar de sus hijos es primero. Proyecto realizar mejoras en la vivienda. De professión costurera desde hace mucho tiempo siendo el recurso económico con que ha salido adelante a su familia. Inicio el negocio con fondo propio aprendió de su mama la costura, ahora sus planes de corto plazo es aumentar las ventas. El préstamo lo utilizará en compra de materiales de construcción como: cemento, arena, piedras canteras, piedrín para construir un sumidero que se requiere para prevenir enfermedades. Agradece por el apoyo de la financiera por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Alda is a single mother whose children are in elementary school.  She is a hard-working woman whose children's well-being is her topmost priority.  Alda is carrying out a project to make some improvements to her home.  She is a seamstress by profession and, for a long time, this has been the way in which she has managed to get her family ahead in life financially.  She started her business with her own funds and learned to sew from her mom.  Her short term plans are to increase her sales.

Alda will use her loan to buy construction supplies such as cement, sand, quarry stone and gravel to build a drain which she needs to prevent illnesses.  She is grateful to the financial institution for improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a drain

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: El señor Santos C. C. , tiene la edad de 52 años , habita  en el municipio de San Ignacio , junto a sus esposa la cual labora como comerciante de frutas y verduras , ellos tienen cuatro hijos ya todos independientes los planes futuros hacia su familia es poder mejor la vivienda y realizar una ampliación , don Santos desde hace 28 años trabaja al campo , ya que sus padres le heredaron para que pudiera sacar hacia adelantes a su familia , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es el humo del volcán ya que por medio de esta emanación provoca la caída  de la cosecha de piña . El necesita que se le apoye para poder realizar la comprar de fertilizante e insumos necesarios para salvar cada mata de piña. Obteniendo este financiamiento podrá salir una producción de muy buena calidad en cuanto a sabor , color , maduración total , etc.
texts.en:
Mr. Santos C. C., 52, lives in the town of San Ignacio with his wife who is a fruit and vegetable merchant.  They have four children who are now independent.  His future plans for his family is to improve and enlarge the house.

Santos has worked the fields for the last 28 years since his parents passed them down to him so that he could support his family.  The greatest challenge he faces is smoke from the volcano that causes the pineapple crops to decline.  He needs help to buy fertilizer and necessary supplies to save each pineapple plant.  By getting this loan he will be able to produce a better quality production with respect to flavor, color, ripeness, etc.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires, chains, ball bearings, seats, pedals, rims and locks.

loans.name: Mahutin Davatin Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHUTIN DAVATIN est formé de trois personnes qui vivent toutes dans la même localité au Benin. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Alexandrine est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Alexandrine est mariée à un pêcheur nommé Abraham. Le couple a cinq enfants, dont deux ne sont plus à leur charge. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Alexandrine habite à dans une petite ville au Benin avec ses enfants et son mari depuis cinq ans. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Il y a près de quatre ans que Alexandrine mène comme activité, la vente de divers produits (biscuits, bombons, etc.) et de façon secondaire la vente de « Agbéli » (aliment local fait à base de maïs) à Sèmè. Alexandrine s’approvisionne à Cotonou. Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Alexandrine désire obtenir un autre crédit avec les autres membres de son groupe.
texts.en:
The MAHUTIN DAVATIN group is made up of three persons who all live in the same locality in Benin. The representative of the group, Alexandrine, is the one raising her hand in the photo. This is the first time that this group has requested a loan from ALIDé with the intention of boosting their businesses. 

Alexandrine is married to a fisherman named Abraham. The couple have five children; they are no longer responsible for two of them. Some of the children are enrolled in school. 

Alexandrine has lived in a small town in Benin with her children and her husband for five years. The couple share in supporting their family. For about four years,  Alexandrine has been selling various items (cookies, candies, etc.) and secondarily « Agbéli » (a local dish made of maize) in Sèmè. She buys her supplies in Cotonou. Wishing to expand her inventory and better meet the demand of her clientele, Alexandrine wishes to obtain another loan together with the members of her group.

loans.use: to buy various items (candies, cookies, etc.)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more products to stock up her store.

loans.name: Enagnon-Sekadji Group

texts.fr: ENAGNON-SEKADJI est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres fréquentent la même Eglise. La représentante du groupe, Justine (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est née en 1977 et réside au quartier Ahouansori à Cotonou, il y a juste trois mois. Justine est mariée à un chauffeur du  nom de Hubert. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge.  Justine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Justine a très peu fréquenté l’école. Pour subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants, Justine mène comme activité la vente de produits divers (pâtes alimentaires, tomates, épices, etc.) par le système de distribution. C’est à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin, que Justine s’approvisionne. Justine exerce cette activité depuis trois ans. C’est la première fois que Justine et son groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur fonds de roulement et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
ENAGNON-SEKADJI is a three-person group, whose members go to the same church. The group’s representative, Justine (who is raising her hand on the photo), is born in 1977. She has been residing in the Ahouansori neighborhood of Cotonou for just three months. Justine is married to a driver named Hubert. The couple has three children, who all go to school and depend on them.  Justine lives together with her husband and her children. She did not go to school much.

To provide for her children’s needs, Justine is active in the retail of various products (pasta, tomatoes, spices, etc.) through the distribution system. She procures her supplies in Dantokpa, Benin’s international market. Justine has been active in this business for three years. This is the first time that Justine and her group are requesting ALIDe’s financial support, in order to increase their working capital and better answer their customers’ demand.

loans.use: to purchase various foodstuffs (spaghetti, tomatoes, stock cubes, etc.)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plastic bowls, buckets, and other plastic utensils

loans.name: Gladys Estela

texts.es: La Joven Gladys Estela Sánchez Q., tiene la edad de 33 años, habitante del municipio de la concepción, juntos a sus padres y hermanos, los planes  futuro hacia su familia es poder llevar agua potable hasta la vivienda ya que actualmente tienen que usar barriles, baldes y un carretón para poder hacer uso del vital liquido, la Joven desde  hace doce años labora como agricultura ya que sus padres le apoyan con el cuido del cultivo de cítricos y otros productos que siembran para poder sobre vivir , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es el robo del productos   debido que por la noches no se queda nadie cuidando el cultivo . Gladys se siente contenta por la confianza que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de fondos Kiva siendo una persona muy humilde y de bajos recursos, pero si muy trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en:
Gladys Estela Sánchez Q. is 33 years old.  She lives in the town of La Concepción together with her parents and siblings.  Her future plans for her family are to bring drinking water to their home since they currently have to use barrels, buckets and a cart to make use of this vital liquid.  Gladys has been working as a farmer for twelve years.  Her parents support her in caring for her citrus crops and the other crops that she sows in order to survive.

The biggest problem that Gladys faces is people stealing her produce since there is nobody looking after her crops at night-time.  Gladys feels happy with the trust that Afodenic has placed in her through their Kiva funds.  She is a very humble person of limited financial resources but she is very hard working and responsible.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies

loans.name: Souroubadou Group

texts.fr: SOUROUBADOU  est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres viennent du même village.  La représentante du groupe, Rachidatou  (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est née le 15 Juin 1977 à Kandi au Nord du Bénin. Rachidatou  est mariée à un chauffeur du nom de Aboubakar  est mère de trois enfants, tous scolarisés. Rachidatou  s’est installée avec son mari et ses enfants au quartier Tanto à Cotonou (capitale économique du Bénin),  depuis une douzaine d’année. Le couple subvient ensemble aux divers besoins des enfants.  Pour se prendre en charge et assurer les besoin de ses enfants, Rachidatou  mène comme activité depuis près de dix ans, la vente de divers produits notamment le maïs, l’igname, l’huile, etc. Rachidatou  achète ses produits au marché de l’Abattoir à Cotonou et les revend dans le même marché.  C’est la deuxième fois que Rachidatou  sollicite un crédit auprès de  ALIDé, crédit qui permettra certainement à Rachidatou  et à son groupe d’accroître leur stock de produits et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle.
texts.en: The “Souroubadou” group consists of three individuals from the same village. The group’s representative, Rachidatou (raising her hand in the photo), was born on June 15, 1977 in Kandi, in the North of Benin. Rachidatou is married to a driver by the name of Aboubakar and is the mother of three children, all of whom are in school. Rachidatou has been living in the Tanto neighborhood in Cotonou (the economic capital of Benin) with her husband and children for about a dozen years. The spouses jointly provide for the children’s needs. In order to support herself and the children, Rachidatou has been working as a vendor for over 10 years, selling various products, particularly corn, yams, vegetable oil, etc. Rachidatou buys her wares at the Meat Market in Cotonou and resells at the same market. It is the second time that Rachidatou is requesting a loan from ALIDé. The loan will allow Rachidatou and her group to increase their stock and better meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy corn, yams, oil, etc.

loans.name: Tomas Adan

texts.es: Tomas tiene 57 años es casado y tiene 2 hijos años que están a su cargo. Su negocio es el destace de cerdo. Inicio su negocio con el apoyo de su familia tiene trabajando en esta actividad 5 años aproximadamente, los desafíos que el enfrenta son de salud ya que tiene que recorrer distancias muy grandes para comprar los cerdos que le ofrecen. Su sueño en el futuro es brindarle mejoras a su vivienda y brindarle una mayor comodidad a su familia. El dinero será invertido en la compra de cerdos.
texts.en: Tomas, 57, is married and has two children in his care.  His business is butchering pigs.  He started the business with help from his family and has been in this line of work for about 5 years.  The challenges he faces are health related because he has to travel long distances to buy the pigs he’s offered.
