Mercy owns a poultry farm where she rears broilers for meat and eggs that she then sells to the local people. She has been running this business for the last year and has managed to give employment to one person.

She says this business is profitable but the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works very hard from early morning to late evening to keep her business doing well.

She is using this loan of KES 60,000 to buy more poultry to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers. Mercy hopes to be a millionaire in the future. She describes herself as a self-reliant lady.

loans.use: to buy more poultry.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, flour, cooking oil, detergents, etc., for resale.

loans.name: Aggrey

texts.en:
Aggrey O. O. is 40 years old, widowed, and has three children between 18 and 2 years old. 

His business well known by the name Smile Migingo Agencies, and it is located at Kakamega town. Kakamega is a rich agricultural area in the western region of Kenya. The area is known for large-scale production of sugarcane and thus commonly referred to as the sugarbelt region. 

He sells soft drinks such as Afia juices, Alvaro, sodas and mineral water to the local people. He has been doing this business for three years now and has managed to give employment to three people. He says that this business is profitable and the major challenge he has is seasonal changes. This is because during cold weather and rainy season the business goes down. However, he works very hard to keep his business doing well.

He is using his loan of KES 60,000 to buy more soft drinks to grow his business and meet the demands of his customers. He hopes to be the leading soft drinks distributor in Kakamega county and western province in the future. He describes himself as hardworking, innovative and a team player. He says since he joined SMEP he knew the sky is the limit.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a power saw

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials such as wood and zinc.

loans.name: Pablo Antonio

texts.es:
Pablo Antonio es originario del municipio de Santa Rosa Del Peñón del departamento de León. ES felizmente casado y tiene cuatro hijos a su cargo a los que debe proporcionarle las condiciones de vida para que ellos se desarrollen.

Pablo cuanta con una casa de habitación pero tiene problemas con el techo. Es por este motivo que el destino del crédito es para la compra de zinc para el mejoramiento de su techo, ya que esto le permitirá mantener en mejores condiciones su vivienda y así cuando entre el invierno no tener problemas y así beneficiar a su familia.
texts.en:
Pablo Antonio lives in the municipality of Santa Rosa del Penon of the department of Leon. He is married and he has 4 children in his care. 

His house is in a poor state of repair and there are problems with the roof. This loan will be used to purchase zinc to improve the roofing. This will help him keep his home in better condition, especially when the winter comes. This will help him maintain his family's wellbeing.

loans.use: to purchase zinc.

loans.name: Cliffton

texts.en:
Cliffton O. is twenty-eight years old and married. His wife runs a grocery shop and they have two children aged four years old and one year old whom they wish to give a good education to the university level. His business is located at the busy Kibuye market in Kisumu. Kisumu is the region in Kenya that harbors Lake Victoria and is commonly referred to as the lake basin.

Cliffton runs a carpentry shop in which he makes beds, cupboards, couches and other things for the local people. He has been operating this business for nine years now and has managed to provide employment to two people. He says that this business is profitable and the major challenge he has is financial constraints. However, he works very hard to keep his business doing well.

Cliffton is using this loan of 80,000 KES to increase his inventory of timber and cloth for making couches and other items as per his customers' demands. He hopes to grow his business and open a show room for leather couches and, in future, become the leading seller of standard furniture in Kisumu. He describes himself as intelligent.

loans.use: to buy timber and cloth

loans.name: Blanca Yolanda

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 51 años de edad, no cuenta con hijos menores de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo.  EL  lugar donde vive es en el centro poblado menor Chacupe bajo en el distrito de La victoria, el lugar donde vive no tiene servicios de agua y desagüe, ya que el consumo de agua lo realiza mediante un pozo o noria.

Blanca se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores y aves de corral, el cría gallinas, patos, pavos y gallinas en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. 

Ella  desea comprar mas cantidad de animales para su crianza y venta, así como también sus respectivos  alimentos para sus aves ya que la demanda aumenta durante esta  temporada, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 600 nuevos soles.

Blanca  es una madre bastante entregado a su familia y que siempre vela por su bienestar y desarrollo. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Blanca is 51 years old.  She does not have any dependent children and lives in her own home together with her husband.  She lives in a small village called Chacupe Bajo, in La Victoria district.  She does not have piped water or sewerage services.  She gets her water from a well or waterwheel.

Blanca raises and sells animals and poultry.  She raises hens, ducks and turkeys out the back of her home and, when they have reached a good level of development, she offers them for sale to the traders who usually visit her area.

Blanca would like to buy more animals to raise and sell and also feed for her birds since demand rises during this season.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 600 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Blanca is a woman who is committed to her family and always watches over their well-being and development.  People who know her have a lot of respect and affection for her.

loans.use: to buy animals and their respective feed

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
ANA tiene  29 años de edad. Vive en casa propia la cual a construido de a pocos fruto de su trabajo y la de su esposo, su casa esta ubicada en en la ciudad de Eten a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo 

Ana  posee una bodega la cual ella misma administra con una experiencia de mas de  05 años en el negocio. Sus ventas son de forma diaria y al contada adicional mente cliente se dedica a realizar trabajos en ternopol, su cónyuge es maestro constructor apoyando así en los gastos de la unidad familiar 


Ana está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme de 1000 nuevos soles para invertir en compra de productos y en compra de un estante

Ana es una madre bastante entregada a su familia y que siempre vela por su bienestar y desarrollo. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Ana is 29 years old.  She lives in her own home which she has recently built as a result of her own work and that of her husband.  Her home is located in the town of Eten, one hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Ana owns a grocery store which she has been running for more than five years.  She makes her sales every day for cash.  She also makes handicrafts from tecnopol (a foam material).  Her husband is a master builder and they support each other in covering their family expenses.

Ana is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in buying products and also a shelf. 

Ana is a mother who is committed to her family and always watches over their well-being and development.  People who know her have a lot of respect and affection for her.

loans.use: to buy supplies to stock her store

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita tiene 51 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos ya independientes, que también le apoyan económicamente. Vive con su esposo,  una hija y sus dos nietos,vive en el distrito de Chepen que queda a una hora de la provinvia de Chiclayo y a 2 horas del departamento de la Libertad.  Las cuales se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y turismo

Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual ella atiende.   Allí ofrece en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida, adicionalmente se dedica a la venta ambulante de helados en un carrito. Con estas actividades ella ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento económico de su familia.

La creciente demanda que la bodega de  Margarita  ha venido experimentando ha hecho que ella piense en ampliarla adquiriendo más productos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Margarita es una mujer bastante trabajadora y de muy buen carácter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Margarita is 51 years old and has four children who live independently and support her financially.  She lives with her husband, a daughter, and her two grandchildren in Chepen district, one hour from Chiclayo province and two hours from La Libertad department.  Here the locals work in agriculture, livestock raising and tourism.

Margarita has a small grocery store in her home where she works.  She sells staple goods, basic household products and groceries to her neighbors and local customers.  Her business is very popular.  In addition, Margarita sells iced treats from a cart as an itinerant vendor.  Through these business activities, she helps her husband to financially support their family.

As a result of the growing demand that Margarita's grocery store has experienced recently, she decided to expand her business by acquiring more products.  For this reason, she requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Margarita is a hard-working, very good-natured woman.  People who know her have a lot of respect and affection for her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Jesus Maria

texts.es:
Jesús María tiene  55 años de edad, vive con su esposo y 01 hijo. Cuenta con casa propia ubicada  en un caserío a 10 kilómetros del Distrito Las Lomas, cuenta con Luz eléctrica pero no con agua y desagüe.

Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual ella atiende hace 5 añps.  Allí ofrece en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida, adicionalmente se dedica a la venta ambulante de helados en un carrito. Con estas actividades ella ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento económico de su familia.

La creciente demanda que la bodega de Jesus Maria  ha venido experimentando ha hecho que ella piense en ampliarla adquiriendo más productos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2500 nuevos soles.

Jesus Maria es una mujer bastante trabajadora y de muy buen carácter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Jesús María is 55 years old and lives with her husband and one child.  She owns her own home which is located in a small village, 10 kilometers from Las Lomas district.  Her home has electricity but not piped water or sewerage.

Jesús María has a small grocery store set up in her home which she has run for five years.  She sells staple goods, basic household products and groceries to her neighbors and local customers.  Her business is very popular.  She also sells iced treats from a cart as an itinerant street vendor.  Through these businesses, she helps her husband to financially support their family.

As a result of the growing demand that her grocery store has been experiencing recently, Jesús María decided to expand it by acquiring more products.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Jesús María is a hard-working, very good-natured woman.  People who know her have a lot of respect and affection for her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Maria Bertha

texts.es:
María  tiene 57 años de edad, vive con conviviente y sus 2 hijos, vive en casa propia que esta ubicada en un caserío llamado  Huáscar  en el distrito de Tambogrande, este caserío es  mediano con deseos de superación.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de cerdos y  animales menores y aves de corral, el cría gallinas, patos, pavos y gallinas , en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Ella cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el rubro 

María desea adquirir alimentos balanceados  para sus cerdos y aves, ya que la demanda ha aumentado, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

María es un padre bastante entregado a su familia y que siempre vela por su bienestar y desarrollo. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
María is 57 years old.  She lives with her common-law husband and two children in her own home which is located in a village called Huáscar, in Tambogrande district.  This is a medium-sized, developing village.

María raises and sells pigs, young animals and poultry.  She raises hens, ducks and turkeys in an area behind her home and, when the animals have reached a good level of development, she offers them for sale to the traders who usually visit her area.  She has more than five years experience in this line of work.

María would like to acquire balanced feed for her pigs and poultry since her demand has increased.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

María is a mother who is committed to her family and always watches over their well-being and development.  People who know her have a lot of respect and affection for her.

loans.use: to acquire balanced feed for her animals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to have maintenance work carried out on his motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Dolores Mercedes

texts.es:
Dolores Mercedes es habitante del municipio Santa Rosa del Peñón en León, es una dama que se ha destacado por velar por el bienestar de su familia dando lugar al cuido de esta y preocupándose por el bienestar de su casa.

Está atravesando la necesidad de invertir a lo inmediato en el mejoramiento de su vivienda y para ello ha acudido a Ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito para la compra de cemento y arena para mejorar su vivienda en especial el local de la cocina. Ella espera muy confiadamente en que este crédito le será otorgado y así podrá mejorar sus condiciones y brindar mejoras a su vivienda para beneficio de su familia.
texts.en:
Dolores Mercedes lives in the municipality of Santa Rosa del Penon, in the department of Leon. She is a woman who stands out ensuring the well-being of her home and family.

She has realized the need for investing immediately in improving her home, and for this reason has approached CEPRODEL (Kiva field partner) with the aim of receiving a loan to purchase cement and sand to renovate her home, especially the kitchen. She is very hopeful that she will receive this loan and thus will be able to improve her living situation and benefit her family.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand to renovate her kitchen.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 66 años de edad, él es casado y tiene 01 hijo a su cargo.  Vive en casa propia y está ubicada en el caserío Guaraguaos alto del distrito de Tambogrande en Piura al norte del Perú.  Antonio vive en la parte rural de este distrito y no cuentan con los servicios básicos.

Antonio se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 6.09 hectáreas, en la cual tiene  mango en producción, dicha plantación tiene 8 años de edad y 1.50 hectáreas de maíz con 10 días de haber sido sembrado. 

Complementariamente se dedica a la crianza ganado ovino, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado loca,  cuenta con una experiencia de 20 años en el rubro, tiempo en el cual Antonio a podido posicionar a sus animales en un mercado fijo permanente.

Antonio a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa 3000 para poder comprar fertilizantes y agroquímicos para el cultivo de mango. De esta manera se logrará una cosecha óptima y oportuna.

Antonio es una persona empeñosa y trabajadora, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Antonio, 66, is married and has one child in his care.  He lives in his own house located in the hamlet of Guaraguaos Alto in Tambogrande District in Piura in northern Perú.  Antonio lives in the rural part of this district and does not have basic utilities.

Antonio is a farmer.  He has 6.09 hectares planted with mangoes.  The plantation is 8 years old.  He also has 1.5 hectares of corn that was planted ten days ago.

In a complementary fashion, he also raises sheep which, when they reach ideal size and weight, he sells at the Ioca market.  He has twenty years experience in this line of work and this length of time in business has made it possible for Antonio to position his animals in a fixed market permanently.

Antonio has requested a 3000 PEN loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy fertilizer and farming chemicals for his mango crops in order to obtain an optimal, timely harvest.

Antonio is a determined, hard working person.  His greatest wish is to continue growing as a businessman to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and agricultural chemicals for his mango crops.

loans.name: Aura Lila

texts.es:
En el municipio El Sauce en León, la señora Aura es una persona muy alegre y con muy buenos valores morales que ha cultivado desde muy pequeña. Es casada y con la responsabilidad de cuidar de sus hijos en conjunto con su cónyuge. Una de las características que ella tiene es que ha sabido brindar a sus pequeños la educación por lo que tiene el sueño que estos se desarrollen y lleguen a ser grandes profesionales.

Hoy en día ella está atravesando una necesidad y es que debe fortalecer las paredes de su casa y darle una mejora. Para esto ella ha solicitado un crédito para darle lugar a la compra de cemento y arena y así llevar a cabo su obra de construcción que tanto requiere en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Aura lives El Sauce in the department of Leon. She is a very happy person with good moral values that she has been developing since she was a child. She is married and is responsible for taking care of her children, along with her spouse. One of her characteristics is that she knows how to educate her children, since she dreams that they develop as people and grow to be grand professionals.

Today she realizing the need to strengthen the walls of her home. For this reason she has asked for a loan to purchase cement and sand to begin the construction that her home so requires.

loans.use: to purchase bricks and cement to renovate her home.

loans.name: Omar Adolfo

texts.es:
El cliente Omar Adolfo L. V.. Vive en el municipio Santa Rosa Del Peñón departamento de león del centro de salud 1/2c al sur, Es Casado tiene 3 hijos a su cargo  trabaja actual mente Trabaja en la alcaldía santa Rosa del peñón desempeña  el cargo como administrador tiene 10 años de estar laborando en esta institución.
El cliente cuanta con una casa de habitación en malas condiciones el cual la quiere mejorar, ya que noto el cambio con la mejora de a través del financiamiento con Ceprodel, por tal razón que está solicitando un nuevo crédito, para la construcción de un porche de entrada en su vivienda.
El destino del crédito es para la Compra de sementó y Ladrillos para la construcción de un porche. 
Esto le permitirá mantener en mejores condiciones el bien estar de su familia
texts.en:
The client is Omar Adolfo L. V.. He lives in the city of Santa Rosa Del Peñón in the department of león del centro de salud 1/2c al sur. He is married and he has three children. He works in  Santa Rosa Del Peñón where he is an administrator. He has worked in this setting for 10 years.
The client has a house that is in bad shape that he wants to improve. Now he has realized the improvements are possible through the funding provided by Ceprodel.  For this reason, he is requesting a new loan in order to build a front porch for his home.
This credit will be used for the purchase of cement and bricks for the construction of the porch.
This allows him to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: buy cement and bricks to build a porch

loans.name: Jorge Isaac

texts.es:
El cliente Jorge Isaac R.  R.. Vive en el municipio Santa Rosa Del Peñón departamento de león Costado Oeste Iglesia Católica, Es Acompañado  trabaja actual mente en la alcaldía santa Rosa del peñón desempeña  el cargo como Responsable De unidad de Adquisición tiene 11 años de estar laborando en esta institución.
El cliente cuanta con una casa de habitación Familiar el cual la quiere mejorar, donde con la oportunidad que Ceprodel le ha brindado con el crédito anterior él ha visto su cambio en su vivienda es por tal razón que está solicitando nuevamente para la misma actividad
El destino del crédito es para la compra de Sementó y arena  para el mejoramiento de su vivienda. 
Esto le permitirá mantener en mejores condiciones el bien estar de su familia.
texts.en:
This client is Jorge Isaac R.  R.. He lives in the municipality of Santa Rosa del Peñón, in the department of León Costado Oeste Iglesia Católica. He has a live-in partner. He currently works for the city authorities of Santa Rosa del Peñón, holding the position of manager of the acquisitions unit. He has worked for this institution for 11 years. 

The client has a family home that he would like to improve. With the opportunity for a previous loan provided to him by Ceprodel, he has made positive changes to his house. For this reason, he is requesting a new loan for the same purpose. 

The loan will be used to buy cement and sand to improve his home. This will allow him to provide for his family's well-being in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to coat walls.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
La señora Miriam V. O. tiene 27 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos pequeños, vive en el barrio de ingreso a Fortaleza a 12 km. de la ciudad, es profesional ingeniero Forestal y quiere trabajar en su profesión para lo cual necesita capital de inversión para los plantines de flores y construir un muro perimetral en su vivienda que está sin los mismos por falta de dinero.  

Ya tiene un pequeño vivero con plantas ornamentales las mismas que comercializa en la feria de los domingos en el barrio, esta actividad le ha estado ayudando a crecer poco a poco en su actividad.
texts.en:
Miriam V. O. is 27 years old. She is married and she has two small children. She lives in a neighborhood near Fortaleza, 12 Km. from the city. She is a professional forest engineer and she want to work in this field. She needs investment capital for flower seedlings and to build a perimeter wall which has not been built due to a lack of money. 

She has a small nursery with ornamental plants. She sells them at the market on Sundays in her neighborhood. This is helping her to grow her business little by little.

loans.use: with operating capital for her flower growing activities

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer A. O. is 29 years old and married. She and her husband have five children whom they hope to educate to the university level. 

She runs a fish sales business at a busy market in Kisumu. Kisumu is the region in Kenya that harbors Lake Victoria and is commonly referred to as the lake basin.

She has been operating this business for three years now and has managed to provide employment to one person. She says that this business is profitable and the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works very hard to keep her business doing well. 

She is using this loan of KES 30,000 to buy more fish to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers. She hopes to grow her business and open a hotel where she will be serving fish fillet and other types of food to her customers. She describes herself as hardworking and visionary.

loans.use: to buy more fish to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bricks, zinc, cement, and sand, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a wardrobe and a set of chairs

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
La señora  Maria Teresa  tiene 38  años de edad, viven en la comunidad de Buena Vista de la  provincia de Mizque del departamento de Cochabamba,   tiene dos hijos, el padre de su hijo les dejo a causa de un accidente,  ahora  ella sola tiene que mantener y alimentarlo a su do  hijo.

Maria Teresa  es una persona  muy querida y respetada en el lugar donde vive, por lo dedicada a su hijo  y su trabajo se dedica a trabajar de cocinera y tiene su pequeña  tienda de abarrotes  donde sus ingresos son muy bajos, ella está solicitando el crédito para aumentar su tiendita de abarrotes, venta de fideos, aceites y todos los productos de  la canasta familiar y asi poder mejorar sus ingresos económicos y  darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo y pueda asistir a la escuela  en mejores condiciones.  El crédito ayudara mucho a su hijo y a ella en el duro trabajo que realiza.
texts.en:
Maria Teresa is 38 years old and lives in the community of Buena Vista in the Mizque province in the Cochabamba department.  She has two children.  The father of her children left because of an accident, and now she only has to care for and feed her children.

Maria Teresa is a well-liked and respected person in her community because of her dedication to her children and her work.  She works as a cook and has a small grocery store, where her income is very small.  

She is asking for this loan to expand her grocery store to sell noodles, oil, and other household necessities so that she can improve her income and give her children a better quality of life, so they can attend school in a better condition.  The loan will help her and her children in the hard work they do.

loans.use: to expand the merchandise at her grocery store.

loans.name: Adriana Mercedes

texts.es:
La Sra. Adriana Gurdián es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, es madre de tres hijos, se desempeña como profesora de primaria en un colegio de la localidad donde ha brindado sus servicios por más de veinte años para el aprendizaje de los niños.
Cuenta con su propia vivienda la que pretende mejorar poco a poco para el bienestar de sus hijos por eso una de las necesidades que tiene en estos momentos es adquirir materiales de construcción como ladrillos, zinc y cemento para construir un cuarto y ampliar tal vivienda, por tal razón decidió solicitar su tercer crédito en Ceprodel con el objetivo de cumplir con su necesidad.
texts.en: Adriana Gurdián is a native of the municipality of El Sauce.  She is the mother of 3 children, and she works as an elementary school teacher in a school in her area.  She has been teaching children for more than 20 years.  Adriana has her own home, which she is attempting to improve little by little for the benefit of her children.  At this time, one of the things she needs is to acquire construction materials such as bricks, sheets of corrugated metal roofing material and cement, so that she can build a room and expand her house.  For this reason, she decided to request her 3rd loan from Ceprodel so that she can accomplish this objective.

loans.use: to buy bricks, corrugated metal sheeting and cement

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy chicken and sausage

loans.name: Wakilare Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Wakilaré  est crée en Décembre 2007. Il  est composé de 10 femmes qui  habitent le même quartier. Elles ont une bonne entente. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame D. B. (debout à l’extrême droit sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est  âgée de 47 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de sept enfants. 

Elle fait le petit commerce de légumes dans le marché de son quartier. Elle a plus de 5 ans d’expérience dans ce domaine d’activité.

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra de financer son petit commerce de légumes.

Les bénéfices générés par son activité lui permettront d’aider son mari dans la prise en charge de la scolarité et de la nourriture des enfants.
texts.en:
The Wakilare group was created in December 2007. It is composed of ten women who live in the same neighborhood. They all get along well. Their main activity is retail.

Mrs. D. B. (who stands all the way to the right on the picture) is the group's leader. She is 47 years old. She is married and the mother of seven children. She sells vegetables at her neighborhood's market. She has over five years of experience in this professional domain.

Her new loan will allow her to finance her small business selling vegetables. Benefits generated by her activity will make it possible for her to help her husband provide for the children's education and food.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables intended for sale

loans.name: Jam Tam Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Jam Tam est créé le 15 Novembre 2006. Il est composé de 09 femmes très solidaires. Elles font le petit commerce de denrées alimentaires.

Madame Awa (debout à l’extrême droite de la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle  est âgée de 51 ans. Elle est mariée et  mère de cinq enfants.
 
 Elle vend des denrées alimentaires au marché de Kolda. Elle a plus de dix ans de pratique dans ce domaine d’activité.

Son nouveau  crédit lui permettra d’augmenter sa capacité d’approvisionnement en denrée alimentaire.

Les bénéfices serviront à aider son mari dans la prise en charge de la scolarité, de la santé et de la nourriture des enfants.
texts.en:
The Jam Tam group has been created on November 2006. It is composed of nine women  united by a  team spirit. They retail   foods products.

Mrs. Awa  (standing to the far right in the photo) is the group’s leader. She is 51 years old. She is married and the mother of five.
She sells food products at the Kolda market. She has over 10 years of experience in this work. 

The income will allow her to help her husband provide for the education, healthcare and food for their children.

loans.use: to stock up on food products for resale

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce K. is a twenty-eight-year-old married lady and the mother of two children aged twelve years old and four years old. Her business is located at the busy Kitengela area where there are many businesses and people. Joyce has been selling timber to business people in the area. She has been in this business and says that the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works very hard to keep her business doing well.

She is using this loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy more timber to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers. She hopes to grow her business and in future open a big hardware store. She also sees herself giving her children a good education to the university level. She describes herself as very hardworking and determined.

loans.use: to buy timber

loans.name: Luisa Inocencia

texts.es:
Inocencia es una madre trabajadora D. 61 años D. edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijo en la parte rural del distrito D. TambogranD.- Piura. La casa D. Inocencia no cuenta con los servicios básicos D. luz, agua y desagüe.

Inocencia se dedica a la crianza D. ganado vacuno, los cuales le producen leche diaria la cual venD., esta actividad la realiza desD. hace 5 años. Cuenta con corrales apropiados y espaciosos. Complementariamente Inocencia se dedica a la agricultura  junto con su esposo, ellos cuentan con una hectárea D. mango, los cuales cultivan D. manera adecuada para tener una buena producción.

Inocencia solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles los cuales destinará en la compra del alimento balanceado D. sus vacas, que le permiten tener una buena calidad D. leche para venderla al precio justo.

Inocencia es una clienta conocida para Edpyme Alternativa, siendo este su segundo crédito con nosotros. Su primer crédito  lo canceló totalmente anticipándose en la mayoría D. sus cuotas, lo que demuestra que Inocencia es responsable y puntual en sus pagos.

Esta familia D. esposos trabajadores cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales.
texts.en:
Inocencia is a hard working, 61-year-old mother living with her son and husband in the rural part of TambogranD. District, Piura.  Inocencia’s house does not have the basic utilities of electricity, water and sewage.

Inocencia raises cattle that produce daily milk that she sells; she’s been in this line of work for 5 years.  She has appropriate, spacious corrals.  Inocencia and her husband also farm.  They have a hectare of mangoes that they farm in a proper way to obtain good yields.

Inocencia asks Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan which will be used to buy nutritionally balanced feed for her cows that will make it possible for her to obtain good quality milk to sell at a fair price.

Inocencia is a very well known client of Edpyme Alternativa; this is her second loan with us.  Her first loan was repaid in full paying most of her installments ahead of time which shows that Inocencia is responsible and punctual with payments.

This family of hard working spouses has very good personal references.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced cattle feed.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La señora Zenteno Tejerina Maria Elena tiene 24 años de edad y vive en un barrio de la ciudad de Tarija. Maria Elena es madre soltera tiene una hija. Maria Elena se dedica al comercio de verduras actividad que viene realizando desde hace mas de 6 años esta actividad la realiza en el mercado campesino pero tambien esta dedicandose a la confeccion de ropa de mujer, este trabajo le ha ayudado mucho porque como muchos la conocen y por eso le han traido por contrato para entregar muchas prendas, para ello necesita de telas, entretelas, forros, etc.
Maria Elena quiere tener mejores ingresos para brindarle una mejor vida a su hija pero ella nos cuenta que quiere comprar mas material es por eso que el credito sera destinado para la compra de esta mercaderia para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.

Elena nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el proximo credito que solicite sera para la compra de mas maquinaria de costura, porque al parecer esta actividad le genera mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mrs. María Elena Zenteno Tejerina, 24, lives in a neighborhood in the city of Tarija.  She is a single mother of one daughter.  María Elena has sold vegetables for over six years in the local farmers market but she also is starting to make women’s clothes.  This work has helped her quite a bit because, since she is well known by many, she’s been brought contracts to make many items.  In order to do so she needs fabric, lining and other dressmaking supplies.

María Elena wants to earn better income to provide a better life for her daughter but she tells us that she wants to buy more material and that’s what the loan will be used for, to buy this merchandise in order to increase her income this way.

Elena tells us that she wants to improve her living conditions and this is why she says that the next loan she will request will be to buy a sewing machine because it seems this activity will produce higher income.

loans.use: to buy fabric and other dressmaking supplies.

loans.name: Alejandro Usberto

texts.es:
Alejandro es un señor de  60 años de edad que vive con su esposa en el distrito de  Tambogrande- Piura. Esta familia tiene muchos deseos de superación. La esposa de Alejandro es un ama de casa abnegada que le brinda apoyo y amor a su pareja.

Alejandro se dedica a la agricultura teniendo cuenta con su propia parcela sonde tiene cultivos de mango y limón. Este último lo cosecha quincenalmente y le genera ingresos. Además Alejandro trabaja en labores de campo tanto en su terreno como en los vecinos. Su cultivo de mango le produce por campaña. Ambas plantaciones están bien conducidas y requieren de abonamiento y limpieza del terreno. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de 15 años. 

Alejandro solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles el cual destinará en la compra de fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra, para darle las condiciones necesarias a la plantación, tanto de mango como de limón. Esto le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y seguir creciendo en su negocio.
 
Alejandro ha cancelado puntualmente el primer crédito que nuestra entidad le brindó.
texts.en:
Alejandro is a 60-year-old man living with his wife in Tambogrande District, Piura.  This family has a strong desire for self improvement.  Alejandro’s wife is a devoted housewife who provides her spouse with support and love.

Alejandro farms.  He has his own parcels where he grows mangoes and lemons.  The latter are harvested every two weeks and generate income.  In addition, Alejandro works doing field chores on his own land and also for his neighbors.  His mango crops are produced by planting seasons.  Both crops are well cared for and need fertilizing and weed clearing.  He’s been in this business for over 15 years.

Alejandro is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan to buy fertilizer and pay labor costs to provide the crops, both the mangoes and the lemons, with proper care that will allow him to increase sales and continue growing in business.

Alejandro paid back the first loan our entity provided punctually.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pants, shorts, blouses and Capri pants.

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
José es un hombre de negocio, dedicado al comercio desde hace veinte años, como iniciativa ha sido la construcción de su casa, que ha venido mejorando para el bienestar familiar.
Sus ventas son utensilios de electrodomésticos, ropa, zapatos, el cual ha captado su clientela mediante sus líneas de venta dando al contado y al crédito,  Como padre está apoyando a sus hijos a lograr mejores oportunidades con el estudio el cual también su mama los apoya con remesas ya que esta en interior. 
José ha invertido mucho en su negocio el ochenta por ciento de sus préstamos en Afodenic lo ha invertido en compras de su mercadería y un veinte por ciento en la vivienda. La construcción de los cuartos la está haciendo  con ganancias del negocio y parte de dinero que envía su esposa, y ahora con este préstamo será para terminar la construcción y poner techo
texts.en:
José is a businessman who’s been in commerce for twenty years.  Building his house has been his incentive and he’s been improving it for his family’s wellbeing.

He sells home appliances, clothes and shoes.  He has secured customers through by selling both for cash and on credit.  As a father, he’s supporting his children so that they will have better opportunities through schooling.  Their mother also helps by sending regular stipends since she’s abroad.

José has invested much in his business.  Eighty percent of his Afodenic loans has gone into purchasing merchandise and twenty percent has gone to home improvement.  The rooms he’s building are being paid for by profits from the business and part of the money his wife sends him.  Now, with this loan he will finish construction and install the roof.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es:
Cruz tiene 36 años de edad vive junto a sus dos pequeños niños en el distrito artesano de Monsefú - Lambayeque.  El hogar de Cruz no cuenta con todos los servicios básicos.

La falta de una buena calidad de vida, motiva a Cruz  a dar su máximo esfuerzo en su trabajo. Ella se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado de Moshoqueque (a  30 minutos del distrito de Monsefú). Cruz cuenta con un puesto fijo en dicho mercado. El mercado Moshoqueque es el más  conocido  de Lambayeque, es el mercado con mayor comercialización de productos en toda la región. Cruz vende verduras en el mercado de Moshoqueque desde hace 10 años.

Cruz es una madre e hija amorosa, siempre dispuesta a ayudar a su familia. Ella ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1300 nuevos soles para habilitar los servicios higiénicos de la casa de sus padres. Es una prioridad para Cruz que sus padres vivan adecuadamente, es por eso que prefiere brindarles esa ayuda antes que beneficiarse ella con el crédito.

Cruz  tiene buenas referencias personales y laborales, estaría muy agradecida de concedérsele el préstamo.
texts.en:
Cruz is 36 years old and lives with her two small children in the artisanal district of Monsefú, Lambayeque.  Cruz’s home does not have all basic utilities.

Cruz is motivated to work hard because she lacks a good quality of life.  She sells vegetables in the Moshoqueque market (30 minutes from Monsefú District).  Cruz has a fixed stand at the market.  The Moshoqueque market is the best known in Lambayeque.  It is the market with the most products available for sale in the entire region.  Cruz has sold vegetables there for the last 10 years.

Cruz is a loving mother and daughter always ready to help her family.  She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1300 new sol loan to install a toilet in her parents’ house.  It’s a priority for Cruz that her parents live adequately and this is why she’d rather provide them with this help before benefitting herself with this loan.

Cruz has good personal and work references; she is very grateful for having been granted the loan.

loans.use: to install a toilet in her parents' house.

loans.name: Yunes

texts.en:
Yunes M. is a thirty-seven-year-old married lady with four children aged between sixteen years old and five years old to whom they hope to give a good education to the university level. Her business is located at the busy Kitengela area where there are many businesses and people. Yunes has been selling water to the local people. She has been in this business and she says the business is profitable and the major challenge she has is financial constraints. However, she works very hard to keep her business doing well.

She is using this loan of 50,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy water containers for storing more water to be able to supply to a bigger number of customers. She hopes to grow her business and become a renown water supplier in the area. She also sees herself buying a plot of land on which she will build a residential house. She describes herself as very hardworking and social.

loans.use: to buy water containers

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es:
Aurelio es un señor de 51 años de edad que vive junto a su familia en la zona rural del distrito de La Victoria- Chiclayo. En esta zona los pobladores tienen como actividad principal la agricultura y al ganadería (para la venta de leche principalmente) 

Aurelio se dedica a la agricultura desde hace más de 20 años, cuenta con una experiencia ineludible en este rubro. Aurelio cuenta con tierras propias y es allí donde hace sus cosechas para luego comercializarlas a una clientela fija con la que Aurelio cuenta.

Aurelio solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 1200 nuevos soles que utilizará para sembrar camote y alfalfa, ya que son productos óptimos para esta temporada.

Aurelio es un cliente antiguo de Edpyme Alternativa y cuenta con un buen historial crediticio.
texts.en:
Aurelio is a 51-year-old man living with his family in the rural part of La Victoria District, Chiclayo.  The residents of this area are for the most part farmers and raise cattle (primarily for milk sales).

Aurelio has been a farmer for over 20 years.  He has an unavoidable experience in this line of work.  He has land of his own where he grows his crops for subsequent sale to a regular clientele that Aurelio now has established.

Aurelio is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1200 new sol loan that he’ll use for his sweet potato and alfalfa crops which are the optimal products this season.

Aurelio is a longstanding client of Edpyme Alternativa and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to plant sweet potatoes and alfalfa.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María de 18 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Pacasmayo y a una hora del departamento de la Libertad.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla María  es la crianza y venta de aves de corral (pollos, gallinas, patos y pavos), desde hace 2 años, el lugar donde cría  sus animales en la parte posterior de la casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que tengan el tamaño y el peso ideal los oferta en los distintos mercados, ya que cuenta con su propia clientela en la ciudad de Pacasmayo.  Esto le permite obtener mayores ganacias para cubrir sus gastos diarios. 

María  solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar  más animales y realizar unas mejoras en la casa de sus padres.   María es una persona muy conocida en el lugar donde vive porque siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de los suyos, a pesar de su corta edad con el fin que en un futuro  cercano pueda lograr sus objetivos como tener estudios superiores para tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 18 years old and single.  She lives in her parents’ house, which has water and electrical service.  They live in the Pacasmayo district, which is one hour from the La Libertad department.  The people in these zones devote themselves to farming, livestock, and tourism.

Maria has been raising and selling poultry (chickens, hens, ducks, and turkeys) for two years.  She raises her animals in an area behind her house.  She feeds them balanced feed and natural grains.  Once they have reached the ideal size and weight she sells them at different markets.  She has her own customers in the city of Pacasmayo.  This allows her to get greater income to cover her daily expenses.

Maria is requesting a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and to make some improvements to her parents’ house.

Maria is a very well-known person in the place where she lives because, in spite of her young age, she is always thinking about the well-being of her loved ones .  In the near future she would like to be able to achieve her objectives like having a post high school education in order to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more poultry and to make improvements to her parents' house.

loans.name: Rosio

texts.es: La señora Rosio  tiene 28 años y esta casada hace 5 años con el señor Willy  tienen dos hijos Yendy de 9 y Rodrigo  de 3 años viven en su casa propia ubicada en el barrio Noel kenf mercado en la esto esta en la zona naciente del plan 3000 del departamento de Cochabamba. Esta pareja tienen una pequeña vidriera y ambos trabajan en la misma desde hace dos años haciendo trabajos de carpintería de aluminio y otros ella trabaja con su hijo en el lugar ya que no cuenta con niñera y los ingresos no le alcanzan para cancelar una y no se anima a dejarlo solo por su corta edad la situación de la subida de los precios no les a alcanzado para comprar material y su producción está empezando a estancarse por este motivo necesita el préstamo para poder comprar material y así poder sustentando a sus hijos y darles un mejor futuro
texts.en:
Rosio is 28 and has been married for 5 years to Willy. They have 2 children: Yendy, 9, and Rodrigo, 3. They live in their own home located in the neighborhood of Noel Kempff Mercado which is in the burdgeoning Plan 3000 zone of the department of Cochabamba. 

The couple has a small glass store and both have worked there for two years completing carpentry jobs with aluminum and other things. Rosio works with her son there since they don't have a nanny and they don't make enough money to pay one, but she doesn't want to leave him alone because he's so young. The situation caused by increasing prices has not allowed them enough money to buy materials and their production is beginning to stall. For this reason they need a loan to buy material and be able to take care of their children and give them a better future.

loans.use: to purchase glass panes

loans.name: Benicio

texts.es:
Benicio tiene 39 años de edad y vive en una casa familiar en el distrito de OImos ubicado en Lambayeque. Benicio vive en la parte urbana de este distrito y cuenta con los servicios básicos.

Desde hace 6 años, Benicio tien una bodega de abarrotes (arroz, azúcar aceite) la cual cuenta con una clientela establecida. Benicio realiza las compras para su bodega en el distrito de Olmos pero una vez al mes en la ciudad de Chiclayo, pues encuentra mayor variedad de productos y a veces a menor precio. Benicio siempre ha surtido su negocio con capital propio. Sin embargo este ahora no le alcanza.

Benicio solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que utilizará par comprar productos para su bodega, pues su demanda ha crecido y los precios del azúcar y el arroz han subido.
Benicio estaría muy agradecido con este préstamo porque le permitirá no descuida r a su clientela.
texts.en:
Benicio is 39 years old.  He lives a relative’s house in the Olmos district in Lambayeque.  Benicio lives in the urban part of this district, and he has basic services.

Benicio has had a grocery store (rice, sugar, oil) for six years, and he has established customers.  Benicio makes the purchases for his grocery store in the Olmos district.  However, once a month he buys in Chiclayo because he finds a greater variety of products, and at times, lower prices there.  Benicio has always stocked his business with his own capital.  However, he does not have enough now.

Benicio is requesting a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use the loan to buy products for his grocery store.  His demand has grown, and the sugar and rice prices have increased.

Benicio would be very grateful for this loan because it would keep him from disappointing his customers.

loans.use: to buy groceries (rice and sugar).

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana pequeña comerciante de alquiler de sillas y mesas con más de veinte años prestando el servicio a la comunidad. Madre de cinco hijos que junto a su esposo han logrado  buena educación para sus hijos. Cuatro de ellos casados y solo el menor están estudiando.
Con el apoyo de Afodenic ha mejorado parte de su casa, como la inversión de su negocio. Teniendo cinco ciclos en la institución el cual ha pagado en plazos que le ha facilitado un mejor equilibrio en su economía.
Con este nuevo préstamo comprara láminas de zinc, clavos, cuartones para poder reparar el techo.
texts.en:
Juana is a small business owner who rents chairs and tables. She has been providing this service to the community for more than 20 years. She is a mother of 5 children and together with her husband they have given their kids a good education. Four of them are married and only the youngest is still in school. 

With the support of Afodenic she has improved part of her house and invested in her business. She has been through 5 loan cycles with the bank and paying them back over time has helped her to keep her budget more balanced. 

With this new loan she will buy sheets of tin roofing, nails and beams to be able to repair the roof.

loans.use: to buy tin roofing, nails, and beams to repair the roof.

loans.name: Celia Argentina

texts.es: La señora Celia Argentina tiene la edad 54 años, habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, madre soltera, con cuatro hijos todos casados e independiente, los planes hacia un futuro es poder  establecer una venta de carne, lácteos, pollo etc .Para poder trabajar desde el hogar, doña Celia desde hace veinte años labora como estilista domiciliar lo cual a su edad se siente cansada, la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es no poder contar con un capital suficiente para realizar la comprar de materiales de construcción y mejor la vivienda , agradece el financiamiento que se le ha brindado durante cuatro ciclo ya que ha logrado mejorar gran  parte de  la vivienda para poder gozar de un mejor bienestar  junto a sus hijos y nietos .
texts.en:
Celia Argentina is 54 years old and lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe. She is a single mother with four children, all of whom are married and independent. Her plans for the future include being able to establish a business selling meat, dairy products, chicken, etc.

In order to be able to work from home, Celia has worked for 20 years as a home decorator, but at this age she is tired of it. Her greatest challenge is not being able to count on having enough capital to buy construction materials and improve the home. She is thankful for the loans that she has received over 4 cycles as she has been able to improve much of her home so that she can enjoy greater well-being together with her children and grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un joven de 24 años de edad que vive con su esposa y pequeño hijo en el distrito de Tambogrande – Piura. La falta de una buena calidad de vida (la casa de Luis no cuenta con los servicios básicos) lo motiva a seguir trabajando y él tiene muchos deseos de superación.

Luis se dedica diariamente a la crianza de ganado ovino y a la agricultura, este cosecha semanalmente. Además, la crianza de ovejas le ha dado muchas satisfacciones pues las puede comercializar ya sea por carne, por su leche o por su lana. Esto le ha permitido a Luis darle ciertas comodidades a su hijo.

Luis solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1600 nuevos soles para comprarle alimento balanceado a sus ovejas, para que estas tengan una mejor lana y mejor calidad de leche y carne. Además otra parte del crédito será destinada a la compra de fertilizantes para los cultivos de Limón que Luis está cosechando actualmente.

Este crédito le permitirá a Luis seguir creciendo en ambos negocios, para poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Luis cuenta con un buen historial crediticio en nuestra entidad.
texts.en:
Luis is a 24 year old young man who lives with his wife and young son in the Tambogrande-Piura district.  The lack of a good quality of life (Luis’ house does not have basic services) motivates him to continue working.  He has a great desire to get ahead.

Luis devotes himself every day to raising sheep and to farming, and he harvests weekly.  Also, raising sheep has given him great satisfaction because he can sell them for their meat, their milk, or their wool.  This has allowed Luis to give certain comforts to his son.

Luis is requesting a loan for 1,600 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed for his sheep.  This is so that they have better wool and a better quality of milk and meat.  He will use the other part of the loan to buy fertilizers for the lemon crops that he is currently harvesting.

This loan will allow Luis to continue growing in both businesses.  This is in order to give his family a better quality of life.  Luis has a good credit history with our institution.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed and fertilizers.

loans.name: Stephany Amparo

texts.es: La Señorita Stephany, vive por la zona del cementerio de sacaba en anticrético, es soltera joven emprendedora, tiene una tienda muy surtida se encuentra en una zona  céntrica, tiene mucha habilidad para realizar piñatas para todo tipo de acontecimiento, es un apersona muy hábil y creativa, el préstamo invertirá para incrementar su mercadería y  la compra de material de trabajo para las piñatas y compra de regalos para cumpleaños, ya que los días cuando hay fiestas y matrimonios tiene mucha venta y ella desea surtir su tienda, es una persona con ganas de superación agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Stephany rents a house near the cemetery in Sacaba. She is a young, single entrepreneur and has a well-stocked store in the downtown area. She is skilled at making piñatas for all sorts of occasions, and is very capable and creative. The loan will be used to increase her merchandise and buy work materials for the piñatas and to buy birthday gifts, since on the days when there are parties and weddings she has a lot of sales and she wants to stock her store. She has a great desire to succeed and is grateful to the bank for the support it gives her.

loans.use: to buy party supplies in bulk

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es: La Sra. Bernardina cliente antigua, retorna desD. el año 2006, ella se dedica a cultivar plantas ornamentales, como margaritas, fucsias, rosas, geranios etc., luego comercializa las mismas en la zona D. san pedro, su vivero se encuentra ubicado en un lugar muy caliente cubierto con carpas, recientemente le instalaron agua, lo que le favorece en el cuidado D. sus plantas; en las horas que ella trabaja como empleada, le colabora su mamá, una señora ya D. edad, pero muy dinámica, la señora Bernardina tiene dos hijos en edad escolar, el esposo generalmente viaja con una empresa constructora, siendo ella jefe D. su hogar, con el dinero del crédito comprara semillas y plantas, por tal razón se solicita el crédito, y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Bernardina is a long-time client, since 2006. She grows ornamental plants like daisies, fuchsia, roses, geraniums, etc. and later sells them in the zone of San Pedro. Her nursery is located in a very warm area and is covered with tents. She recently had water installed which helps her to take care of her plants. During the hours when she is working as a domestic employee, her mother helps out. 

A grown woman, but still very energetic, Bernardina has two school-aged children. Her husband travels frequently with a construction business, so she feels like the boss of her home. She requested the loan so that she she can buy seeds and plants. She is grateful to the bank for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to buy organic compost and seeds for the nursery.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy molds, insoles and a machine to repair shoes.

loans.name: Hualdir

texts.es:
Hualdir tiene 39 años de edad vive con su esposa y menores hijos en la zona rural de la provincia de Chiclayo – Lambayeque. Hualdir es conocido en su comunidad por ser un hombre trabajador y de  buenos modales, siempre atento con los demás, sobre todo con su esposa y con sus niños.

Hualdir tiene 10 años de experiencia en la agricultura, se dedica a cultivar arroz sobretodo. Él solicita unc rédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para poder comprar insumos para su cultivo de arroz, especialmente para la fertilización de sus tierras y el deshierbo de éstas. 

Hualdir desea realizar este cultivo lo más pronto posible para poder obtener ganancias que le permitan pagar el préstamo y  también reparar algunas fallas presentadas dentro de su hogar.
 
Hualdir cuenta con una buena experiencia crediticia en Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Hualdir is 39 years old.  He lives with his wife and dependent children in a rural area of Chiclayo province - Lambayeque.  Hualdir is known in his community as a hard-working, well-mannered man who is always attentive to other people, above all his wife and children.

Hualdir has 10 years experience in farming and mainly grows rice.  He is requesting a loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can buy supplies for his rice crop, above all so that he can fertilize and weed his land.

Hualdir would like to carry out his sowing as soon as possible so that he can make profits that will allow him to repay his loan and also repair some faults in his home.

Hualdir has a good credit history with Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies for his rice crop
